У него среднее образование, занимается животноводством, как и все сельчане проживающие в одном селе вместе с семьей Насыржана. Благодаря упорному труду активной помощи его супруги, в хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 коровы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 6,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Насыржан обратился в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы для продажи экологически чистого молока. Доходы от кредита Насыржан планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса, ремонт сараев и планирует накопить на покупку автомобиля.
texts.en: Nasyrzhan is 38 years old and has 2 children, a daughter aged five and a son aged twelve. He has a secondary education and works in animal husbandry, like others living in the same village as himself and his family. Thanks to the tireless hard work and active help from his wife, today he has 3 cows on his farm. His monthly income is around 6,000 som (KGS). In order to further expand his farm, Nasyrzhan applied to the bank Bai Tushum for a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) to purchase a dairy cow to sell organic milk. With income from the loan, Nasyrzhan plans to invest in the further development of his business, repair his barn and plans to save up to buy a car.

loans.use: to purchase one cow to increase the volume of organic milk sales.

loans.name: Yeimer Alfonso

texts.es:
Yeimer es un joven empresario que con su negocio de cría de pollos busca sacar adelante su familia conformada por su pareja e hijo, vive en Sahagún, un sector de pocas oportunidades laborales, una zona que está prosperando y creciendo gracias a la mentalidad emprendedora de la nueva generación como la Yeimer que a pesar de padre de familia de una hermosa bebe de 20 meses de edad, lucha día a día por llevarle el alimento.
Hoy Yeimer quiere solicitar un aliento económico para la construcción de un galpón nuevo, necesita malla, arena, cemento, madera, comprara pollos y alimento de engorde.
Su propósito es crecer laboralmente para darle una buena vida a su pareja e hija.
texts.en:
Yeimer is a young entrepreneur, who with his chicken-raising business is working to support his family, made up of his wife and child.

He lives in Sahagún, a sector with very few job opportunities, a zone that is prospering and growing thanks to the enterprising mentality of the new generation, like Yeimer, who despite being the father of a beautiful, 20-month-old baby, works every day to provide for her.

Today, Yeimer is requesting an economic boost in order to build a new shed. He needs wire mesh, sand, cement, wood, and will buy chickens and feed.

His goal is to build his business in order to offer a good life to his wife and daughter.

loans.use: to build a new shed; He needs wire mesh, sand, cement, wood, and will buy chickens and feed.

loans.name: Kwetu Group

texts.en:
Abdallah, who is in his late 30s, is married with three children, one of them is still small and the other two are still in school. He has been selling charcoal for three years now. He works from 6 a.m. to 6 p.m. daily and is able to make a very good monthly profit.

This will be Abdallah's third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to buy a boda boda (motorcycle transport) and to increase his charcoal stock. He has managed to pay back all his loans successfully. He used the profit to pay school fees for his kids, to repay the loan, bought a plot of land and started building his house.

He will use this loan to buy sacks of charcoal to resell. He dreams of finishing building his house.

Abdallah will share his loan with his loan group, Kwetu, which has three members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal to resell.

loans.name: Chiorno Central Group

texts.en:
In the outskirts of Sacapulas, Guatemala, a refreshing and beautiful place amongst rivers running with life and mountains full of vegetation, live the 8 women of “Chiorno Central” trust bank. Between the ages of 20 and 63, most of the group could only study to some level of primary school. Mothers of between 1 and 10 children who are in school, most of these ladies are married, supporting their families alongside their husbands. Living in a place with fertile soil, fed by lots of sunshine and water from the river, many of the clients grow vegetables, basic grains, and beans to sell in the market. In addition, several women weave and embroider traditional textiles. Chiorno Central is happy with the growth they are experiencing in their businesses through the credits they receive.

Magdalena, with 28 years of age and a 5th-grade education, is group president and a mother of 3 children, ages 10, 7 and 5, who study in primary school. Magdalena grows her own vegetables and sells her produce, tomatoes, güisquil, a delicious potato/squash-like vegetable, onions, potatoes, chile, and much more, in the relaxed, happy market of Sacapulas. With her new loan, she plans to buy vegetables that are currently in season, and also Christmas products, such as apples and grapes to sell to her customers. This content woman is happy with her business and the increased profit she is seeing these days with the support of Kiva and Friendship Bridge.

loans.use: to grow vegetables that are currently in season and also Christmas products, such as apples and grapes to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Yaneth Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yaneth es una mujer práctica y curiosa la cual se dedica principalmente a atender a su esposo y a su hijo que tan solo tiene 13 años de edad, siempre le ha gustado ser independiente y ganarse su propio sustento, por eso montó un negocio de cría de cerdos, tanto para complementar el dinero que su esposo entra, como también cubrir los gastos de su amado pequeño.
Con su trabajo persigue un sueño, el cual es comprar una vivienda, un objetivo muy ambicioso que con paciencia y largas jornadas laborales espera cumplir.
Una de las principales preocupaciones de la clientes es no tener capital para invertir en su negocio, ha entrado en un circulo vicioso donde no puede crecer, puesto que las ganancias alcanza para comprar la misma cantidad de cerdos que tenía, por ello quiere realizar una apuesta para le futuro solicitando un préstamo el cual usara en la compra de cerdos adecuación de las porquerizas, gallinas y alimento.
texts.en:
Yaneth is a practical and curious woman who works mainly helping her husband and her son who is only 13 years old.  She has always liked to be independent and make her own living.  That is why she started a business raising pigs, both to supplement the money that her husband earns as well as to cover the costs of her little loved one.

With her job she is following a dream which is to buy a house, a very ambitious objective that with patience and long working days, she hopes to complete.

One of the main worries of Yaneth is not having capital to invest in her business.  She has entered a vicious cycle where she cannot grow since the earnings are enough to buy the same amount of pigs that she had.  That is why she wants to request a loan what she would use to buy enough pigs to have a piggery, hens, and food.

loans.use: To buy enough pigs to have a piggery, hens, and food.

loans.name: Rita Elizabeth

texts.es:
Rita es una clienta emprendedora, sus esfuerzo se refleja en sus dos pequeños negocios, que le permiten sacar adelante a su familia y tenerla calidad vida que se merecen. 
Ella tiene 22 años y un hijo, Rita se dedica a  vender artesanía y también tiene un restaurante, dos negocios rentables pero que necesitan mucho tiempo y trabajo.
Ella desea expandir su negocio de artesanía por eso ella solicito el préstamo para comprar chompas ,guantes, chalinas. para poderlos vender en esta temporada, donde se solicita mucho estos productos.esta muy satisfecha con el prestamo y agradece a los prestamistas de KIVA.
texts.en:
Rita is a very proactive client whose efforts can be seen in her two small businesses that allow her to support her family and offer them the quality of life they deserve. 

She is 22 years old and has one child. Rita sells crafts and also runs a restaurant. Two profitable businesses that require a lot of time and work on her part.

She would like to expand her craft business, and for this reason is seeking a loan to buy sweaters, gloves, and scarves to sell in this season, when these products are in high demand. 

She is very happy to have this loan and sends her thanks to the KIVA lenders.

loans.use: to buy sweaters, gloves, and scarves.

loans.name: Fanny Maria

texts.es:
Ella es Fanny una mujer de 51 años de edad que encontró en un espacio grande desocupado en su casa una oportunidad enorme de generar ingresos que apoyen el sostenimiento y mejora de calidad de vida de su hogar.
Ella inicio un negocio de prestación de servicios, alquila videojuegos, un negocio muy querido entre los niños, por la diversión que les ofrece y principalmente porque ella habita en una zona de postconflicto, los niños no cuentan con capital para comprar un videojuego.
Su negocio está en etapa de crecimiento, ella quiere aprovechar su oportunidad, su apogeo para consolidar su empresa, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra la compra de una consola Xbox y un televisor led.
Su principal objetivo es vivir mejor y alimentar su familia conformada por 4 hijos.
texts.en:
This is Fanny, a 51 year old woman who found in a large, unused space in her home, a great opportunity to generate income to support the sustenance of and improve the quality of life of her household.

She started a business providing services. She rents out video games, a business cherished by the children because of the fun it offers them. The children do not have capital to buy video games mainly because she lives in a post conflict area.

Her business is in a growing phase and she wants to take advantage of the opportunity of a high point to strengthen her business. She is requesting a loan for this to buy an Xbox console and an LED television.

Her main goal is to live better and to feed her family of 4 children.

loans.use: to buy an Xbox console and an LED TV.

loans.name: La Rinconada Group

texts.en:
In La Rinconada, a rural community 20 minutes outside of the city of Quiché, live the 8 women of “La Rinconada” trust bank. Quiché is a large and beautiful city, a little chilly, located in the mountains of central Guatemala, where the people enjoy its full and bustling market, a lovely central park, and many bakeries where they can buy delicious cakes and breads. Between the ages of 19 and 58, almost all of the members are mothers of 2 to 10 children, and are married. For businesses, many of them raise animals, such as chickens and pigs, buying and selling them in Quiché, some weave local traditional clothing, others manage convenience stores or buy and sell animal skin/leather and other products that are staples in the local economy. With 9 cycles in Friendship Bridge, these women enjoy the themes of the various workshops, and all of the information they learn and can use to support the growth of their businesses. 

Micaela is a group member who is 31 years old and studied through 6th grade, caring for her family of 4 children ages 12, 10, 7 and 4, with one child on the way, alongside her husband, who builds homes. The couple is providing education to their children. Micaela’s determination and the success she is seeing in her business, she buys and sales animal skins and leathers. Micaela is a busy lady, travelling frequently to buy her product from carnicerias, meat markets, all over Guatemala, and selling it in various locations in the city of Chimaltenango. With this Kiva loan, she will invest in more leather, confident that she will continue seeing increase in her profit. 

Micaela is happy for all of the opportunities she receives through this organization called Friendship Bridge, such as the loans, the community support in her group, and the educational workshops where she gains tools and abilities to improve her life and her business. Thank you, Kiva investors!!

loans.use: to invest in more leather, confident that she will continue seeing increase in her profit.

loans.name: Las Rosas De Calca Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LAS ROSAS DE CALCA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Sofía, la socia continua con su  negocio de tienda de abarrotes y restaurant, la socia es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora que mediante sus negocios la socia podrá tener más ganancias para de esta forma continuar apoyando a su familia, la socia continua  vendiendo  productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y galletas entre otros, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
 La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, gaseosas, azúcar entre otros.
 Los socios en general se sienten agradecidos por el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank “Rosas de Calca”. This bank is located in the Calca district which belongs to the Calca province in the department of Cusco.

This member is Sofía. The member continues with her restaurant and grocery store business. The member is an entrepreneurial and hard working woman who has been able to increase her earnings through her businesses and is continuing to support her family in this way. The member continues selling food staples like rice, sugar, milk, cookies, etc. The member wishes to continue working to continue supporting her family in this way.

The member is requesting a loan to buy rice, soft drinks, sugar, etc.

In general, the members are very thankful for the loans granted and are committed to fulfilling the established payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, soft drinks, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Aizada

texts.ru: Айзада, 35 лет, замужем, детей нет, образование высшее. Айзада 2 года назад начала заниматься животноводством. В хозяйстве есть 2 дойные коровы, 2 овцы и лошадь. На ежедневной основе Айзада продает молоко. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях увеличения поголовья скота, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку корову. Доходы от бизнес деятельности Айзада будет вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и ремонт отопления в доме.
texts.en: Aizada is 35 years old, married, no kids, has completed higher education. Two years ago she started breeding livestock. She has two dairy cows, two sheep and a horse in her household. Aizada sells milk on a daily basis. Her monthly income is about 10,000 som (KGS). To increase the herd, Aizada turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow. Aizada will invest the borrowed money to further develop her business and repair the heating system in her house.

loans.use: to buy one cow to increase her herd

loans.name: Zulhumor

texts.ru: Зулхумор, 52 года, вдова, есть 4 детей. У Зулхумор среднее образование. Она старается жить в согласии и дружбе со всеми. Зулхумор 31 год занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Зулхумор у нее есть 4 коровы. Ее ежемесячная прибыль - 12,000 сом (KGS). Всю прибыль Зулхумор вкладывает в развитие своего бизнеса. Несколько лет назад Зулхумор начала строительство дома для своей семьи. В целях завершения строительства, она решила обратиться за кредитом в Банк «Бай –Тушум» в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку обоев, штукатурки, краски и прочего. Доходы от бизнеса Зулхумор планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своей деятельности и улучшение жилищных условий.
texts.en: Zulhumor is 52 years old, a widow, and has four children. Zulhumor has a secondary education. She strives to live in harmony and friendship with everyone. Zulhumor has been rearing animals for 31 years. Thanks to Zulhumor's hard work she has four cows. Her monthly profit is 12,000 som (KGS). Zulhumor invests all of her profits in developing her business. A few years ago, Zulhumor began building a house for her family. In order to complete the building, she has decided to apply to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy wallpaper, plaster, paint and other materials. Zulhumor plans to invest the income from her business in further increasing her activities and improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase wallpaper, plaster, paint and other materials in order to finish building her family home.

loans.name: Upakan

texts.ru: Упакан, 55 лет, замужем, имеет 3 сыновей и дочь. Образование среднее, в качестве дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 1996 году с 3,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Упакан, на данный момент в ее хозяйстве имеется 3 коровы, 23 овцы, на участке мерою 2,27 Га она выращивает люцерну и ячмень, также занимается садом. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Упакан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы и бычка. Доходы от кредита Упакан планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса.
texts.en: Upakan is 55 years old, married, and has three sons and a daughter. She has a secondary education. She rears animals and grows crops to get income for her family, having started in 1996 with 3,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Upakan's hard work, at the present time she has three cows and 23 sheep, and she grows alfalfa and barley on a 2.27 hectare plot of land. She also has a garden. In order to develop her business further, Upakan has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy a dairy cow and a steer. Upakan plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow and a steer in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Dinara

texts.ru: Динара, 43 года, замужем, 6 детей. У нее среднее образование. Около 25 лет назад начала заниматься животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Динары, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 6 коров. На 0,56 Га собственной и 2,20 Га арендованной земли она выращивает кукурузу, пшеницу и клевер. Ежемесячная прибыль - 11,000 сом (KGS). Все накопленные средства она старается вкладывать в развитие бизнеса. В этом году Динара решила построить летнюю кухню и застелить двор брусчаткой, поэтому она обратилась в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку кирпичей, цемента, шифера, брусчатки и прочих материалов. Свои доходы от бизнеса Динара планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса.
texts.en: Dinara is 43 years old, married, and has six children. She has a secondary education. She began rearing animals and growing crops about 25 years ago. Thanks to Dinara's hard work, today she has six cows. She grows corn, wheat and clover on 0.56 hectares of her own and 2.2 hectares of rented land. Her monthly profit is 11,000 som (KGS). She tries to invest all of her savings in the development of the business. This year Dinara has decided to build a summer kitchen and to pave her yard with paving stones, and so she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy bricks, cement, slate, paving stones and other materials. Dinara plans to invest the income from her business in expanding it further.

loans.use: to purchase bricks, cement, slate, paving stones and other materials in order to build a summer kitchen and to pave her yard.

loans.name: Leonardo Jose

texts.es:
Leonardo es un hombre de 38 años de edad, una persona trabajadora, luchadora, un hombre que a lo largo de su vida ha sabido valerse por sí mismo, siempre ha gustado del trabajo independiente y gracias a su padre aprendió de la profesión que hoy le genera el alimento a su familia la cual es conformada por su pareja con quien vive en unión libre y sus dos hijos de 10 y 15 años de edad, que es leñador.
Hoy Leonardo se encuentra solicitando un apoyo económico para la compra de su principal herramienta de trabajo que es la motosierra, puesto que la que tenía se averió y no tiene reparación.
Este préstamo le permitirá seguir trabajando, seguir luchando por generar mejor calidad de vida para él y su familia y perseguir ese sueño de comprar una vivienda.
texts.en:
Leonardo is a 38 year old man. He is a hardworking and determined person and is a man whose life shows that he has known how to fend for himself.
He has always liked working independently and thanks to his father he learned the profession of logging that today allows him to provide for his family, which is made up of his common-law partner and their two children, ages 10 and 15.
Today Leonardo is requesting financial assistance to buy his main work tool: a chainsaw, as the one he had broke and cannot be repaired.
This loan will allow him to continue working, to continue to strive to create a better quality of life for himself and for his family, and to pursue his dream of buying a home.

loans.use: to buy a chainsaw, which is his main tool for work.

loans.name: Halema

texts.en:
Financial constraints, along with the desire for a better life and good quality education for her 5 children, are only a few but valuable factors that encouraged Halema to start her business by taking a loan from Kashf Foundation.

Halema is 51 years old, and she is married. In order to cover her household expenses she started her business selling animals. She buys animals - baby goats and calves - at low prices, raises them, and then sells them in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate extra income.

Halema needs to improve her business to continue covering her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of 50,000 PKR to purchase more animals to increase her sales. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to increase her sales.

loans.name: Amaury Alonso

texts.es:
Amaury un hombre que todos los días se levanta con la ilusión y la responsabilidad de ser un mejor padre, un mejor hombre, un mejor empresario, encuentra en sus dos hijas de 7 y 14 años la motivación, las ganas de salir adelante y ofrecerles el mejor futuro posible.
Amaury no puede tener grandes lujos, mucho dinero, solo le puede ofrecer a sus hijas amor y la seguridad de que tienen un padre que está dispuesto a todo solo darles una buena alimentación y ofrecerles educación.
El cliente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para aumentar el número de animales en sus porquerizas, quiere comprar 7 cerdos en total y materiales para realizar adecuaciones locativas.
texts.en:
Amaury is a man who gets up every day with the intention and responsibility of being a better father, a better person, and a better businessman. In his two daughters, who are 7 and 14 years old, he finds the motivation and desire to earn a living and offer them the best possible future.

Amaury doesn't have great luxury, or a lot of money. All he can offer his daughters is love and the assurance that their father will do anything to offer them the food they need and an education.

The client is requesting a loan to increase the number of animals in his pigpen. He wants to buy 7 pigs, in total, and the materials to make the necessary adaptations to his pigpen.

loans.use: to buy 7 pigs, in total, and the materials to make the necessary adaptations to his pigpen.

loans.name: Finauimealelei

texts.en: Finauimealelei is a 25 year old mother with 1 child, she owns and operates a small business of selling pancake, pork cake, buns in her community to earn a living. Finauimealelei requested for a loan to buy a sack of flour, sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, wooden spoon, fry pan, to assist her run the business. She hopes to use her profit to build small bakery store. She joined SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, wooden spoon, fry pan,

loans.name: Mukaddas

texts.ru: Мукаддас, 48 лет, замужем, есть 2 детей. У нее высшее образование, работает в школе завучем, также занимается сельским хозяйством. Благодаря упорному труду Мукаддас и ее семьи, на данный момент в хозяйстве имеется корова. Ежемесячный доход составляет примерно 13,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Мукаддас обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для разведения. Доходы от кредита Мукаддас планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса и покупку мебели для дома.
texts.en: Mukaddas is 48 years old, married, and has two children. She has a higher education and works as the assistant principal in a school. She also farms. Thanks to the hard work of Mukaddas and her family, at the present time she has a cow. Her monthly income is about 13,000 som (KGS). In order to develop her business further, Mukaddas has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy some livestock to breed. Mukaddas plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in expanding her business and buying some furniture for her house.

loans.use: to buy some livestock in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Sauda

texts.en:
Sauda is 41 years old and runs a food stall. She is married and blessed with 5 children. She has been running her business for the past 5 years and it has been profitable.

This is her second loan term with VisionFund Kenya and she paid her previous loan successfully. She will use the loan to buy maize and wheat flour, sugar, beans,cooking fat and milk for sell and hopes this will enable her to make more income to support her family. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her food stall and educate her children.

Her future hopes are to open another food stall and make more income to support her family.

loans.use: to buy maize and wheat flour, sugar, beans,cooking fat and milk for sell and hopes this will enable her to make more income to support her family.

loans.name: Isiya

texts.en:
Isiya is a Babban Gona farmer.  Isiya is excited that Babban Gona offers a lasting solution to ending the cycle of poverty, renewing his dreams of gaining wealth someday. 

Traditionally, Isiya would have had to sell his maize at Harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs. With this loan Isiya can store his maize at harvest and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest. Benefiting from Babban Gona’s marketing support, Isiya has the opportunity to generate earnings of up to $2000/ha. 

Isiya is thankful that he no longer has to worry about having no money to feed his family and children and looks forward to using his additional earnings to buy improved machinery and hire skilled labour.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es:
Sandra una persona alegre, carismática, humilde, tierna, recursiva que se dedicas a la venta de calzado informal, no tiene un local constituido pero la meta es poder tener un punto de venta fijo y seguir trabajando como comerciante mostrando sus productos para generar buenas ventas.
Ella vive en unión libre con su pareja, tiene un pequeño de 9 años de edad, su propósito es como toda madre responsable brindarle mucho amor y un futuro próspero.
Si algo quisiera ella es tener una vivienda propia y ese es su sueño a largo plazo.
Solicita un préstamo para abastecerse de productos entendiendo que se acerca la temporada de diciembre, todo el capital lo invertirá en la compra de calzado.
texts.en:
Sandra is happy, charismatic, humble, and affectionate. She makes a living by selling casual shoes. She does not have a store set up, but her goal is to have a fixed location and continue displaying her products to generate good sales.

She lives in a common-law marriage with her partner. She has a 9-year-old boy. Like all responsible mothers, her goal is to give him lots of love and a prosperous future.

Something Sandra would like to have is her own home and this is her long-term goal.

She is requesting a loan in order to stock up on merchandise as the holiday season is approaching. She will invest all of the capital into purchasing shoes.

loans.use: to stock up on shoes for the holiday season

loans.name: Arinda Del Socorro

texts.es:
Arinda es una persona muy tierna, luchadora, una mujer que ha batallo mil y un batallas y que a sus 51 años de edad, estando separada de su marido, con tres hijos por mantener sigue en pie de lucha, trabajando en su negocio de venta de alimentos, abriendo todos los días, todo esto por generar el sustento para alimentar a su familia, para alimentar sus sueños, sus ilusiones de progreso, de tener una vida mejor y para Arinda es un verdadero orgullo ser la generadora de todos estos sentimientos e ilusiones para su familia y por ello pone tanto esfuerzo en sus actividad diarias, para no decepcionarlos.
Ella actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de activos fijos para mejorar en comodidad y practicidad a sus clientes, con el dinero comprara una carpa, mesas, sillas, pintura y poli-sombra.
texts.en:
Arinda is a very small and hardworking person. She is a woman who has fought one thousand and one battles. At her 51 years of age, separated from her husband with three children to care for, she continues with the struggle. She works at her business selling food and is open everyday. All of this is to generate a livelihood to feed her family and to feed their dreams, their hopes for progress and for having a better life. For Arinda, it is a great pride to be the generator of all of these feelings and hopes for her family. This is why she puts so much effort into her daily work, to not disappoint them.

She is currently requesting a loan to buy fixed assets to improve the comfort and convenience for her customers. With the money she will buy an awning, tables, chairs, paint and a shade covering.

loans.use: to buy an awning, tables, chairs, paint and a shade covering to provide greater comfort for her customers.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem is a hard working lady. Everyday increasing expenditures compelled her to initiate her own business of milk selling. She is a 52 years old married woman. She has buffaloes and cows for milk production and her husband sells the milk in nearby areas. Naseem ’s job is to look after the buffaloes and collect the milk from them. Together, both husband and wife are supporting their family. However they need to earn more income for their everyday expenditures.

Therefore, Naseem has requested for 50000 PKR to buy one more buffalo to cater to more customers for providing better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to buy one more buffalo to cater to more customers for providing better standard of living to her family members

loans.name: Manuel

texts.en:
Manuel is 68 years old, married and has 8 children. He lives in Piura, Perú and grows organic mangoes. As a child, he learned to grow the best mangoes.

Manuel needs US$ 1000 as loan for improving the trees and irrigation system on his land to increase the organic mango production. With the additional income, he will send his children to university.

loans.use: for improving the trees and irrigation system for the organic mango production

loans.name: Noura

texts.en: Noura is a 38 year old married woman. She is living with her husband and her four children, all of them are still studying. She is a housewife where she is dedicated from her home and family. Her husband is the main income provider, he owns a small mini market in his town, but his income is barely sufficient. That’s why, today, she is asking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l; she will be utilizing the loan to buy the school uniform for her children.  She said that this loan will surely helped her to insure the school year for them what makes her very happy.

loans.use: to buy the school uniform for her children

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma se sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta de granos secos y tubérculos, la socia necesita el préstamo para comprar maíz y papa. ella esta muy agradecida con los inversionista de KIva por seguir confiando en ella y ayudarla a conseguir sus sueños que es su local donde pueda trabajar dignamente, y así darle calidad de vida a su familia.
la socia Norma se compromete a pagar puntualmente su deuda y seguir trabajando para seguir adelante.
texts.en:
Norma continues working selling dry grains and root vegetables. The member needs a loan to buy corn and potatoes. She is very thankful for the Kiva investors for continuing to believe in her and for helping her to achieve her dream which is a space where she can work with dignity. In that way, she can give a quality of life to her family.

Norma agrees to pay her debt on time and to continue working to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy corn and potatoes.

loans.name: Aileen

texts.en: Aileen, is aged 35, and she's still single. She owns and manages a restaurant in their town for almost four years and earns a net income of PHP 4,000 a day. Her net income on her business went through her savings. Due to insufficient capital in their village she would like to avail a loan amounting to PHP 50,000 to purchase food ingredients to use in her restaurant. She's hoping that her restaurant will continue to improve and become more profitable.

loans.use: to purchase food ingredients to use in her restaurant.

loans.name: Jose Alirio

texts.es:
José un campesino de mil batallas, una persona que ha dedicado toda su vida al campo, a su familia, a sus 61 años de edad sigue levantándose a primera hora a trabajar fuertemente en sus campos, cultivando, recolectando, vendiendo, su padre le enseño está manera de vida y gracias a esto nunca le ha faltado un alimento en su mesa.
José solo desea una cosa en su vida, tener salud para trabajar todos los días, lo demás espera lograrlo con esas manos arrieras, con su esfuerzo y sudor.
Actualmente José se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas para el cultivo, la razón es que necesita acelerar la producción para evitar pérdidas a futuro pues el fenómeno del niño a azotado muy fuerte las plantaciones
texts.en:
José is a seasoned farmer who has dedicated his whole life to the field and to his family. At 61 years of age, he continues to get up at first light to work hard in his fields to cultivate, harvest, and sell his crops. His father taught him this way of life and thanks to this work, José has never failed to put food on the table.

José only wants one thing in life: to have good health so he can work every day. The rest he hopes to accomplish with the work of his hands, through sweat and hard work.

José is currently applying for a loan so he can buy farming supplies for his crops. The reason for this is that he needs to accelerate output in order to avoid crop losses in the future as the El Niño phenomenon has ravaged the plantations.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies to accelerate the ripening of his crops

loans.name: Antoinette

texts.fr:
Antoinette a 38 ans, elle est mariée. Son mari travaille comme vendeur dans un grand magasin. L’enfant de 14 ans est en classe de troisième, dans une école publique. 
Elle travaillait dans une entreprise de confection de vêtements de 2005 à 2008 mais en raison d’une maladie, elle a quitté son emploi. Comme elle se trouvait sans emploi de 2008 à 2011, elle a démarré l‘activité de vente de friperies en 2011. Les 2 prêts obtenus lui ont permis de développer l’activité : fonds pour acheter des vêtements confectionnés par les entreprises franches et augmentation de stock. Pour cette activité, le chiffre d’affaires dépend du stock de produits. Elle vend en moyenne 2 balles de friperie par semaine, à cela s’ajoute la vente d’autres vêtements. Son rêve est de devenir demi grossiste dans le commerce de vêtements et de friperies.
texts.en:
Antoinette is 38 years old and married. Her husband works as a salesman in a large store. Their child of 14 years old is a freshman in public high school.

From 2005 to 2008, she worked in a clothing design enterprise, but she had to leave her job because of illness. As she was out of work from 2008 to 2011, she started her own business of selling used cloths that year.Two loans she received allowed her to develop her business with funds for buying cloths made by marked companies and increasing her wares. For this business, the turnover depends on the inventory of products. She sells 2 heaps of second-hand cloths per week on average, which goes toward buying more clothing. Her dream is to runs two businesses: second-hand cloths and a grocery.

loans.use: to buy shirts, pants, t-shirts, and polos.

loans.name: Tuli

texts.en:
Tuli is a 52-year-old mother with 2 children. She runs a small business of selling tuna sandwiches in her community to earn a living.

Tuli requested a loan to buy bread, tomato sauce, boxes of canned fish (tuna), plastic bags, containers, and butter to assist with the business. She will expand her business using her profit. She became a member of SPBD in 2011.

loans.use: to buy bread, tomato sauce, boxes of tuna, plastic bags, containers, and butter

loans.name: William Alberto

texts.es:
William es un joven de 23 años de edad, un joven que busca oportunidades para demostrar de que casta está hecho, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para iniciar un negocio de cría de cerdos, su principal razón es que quiere ayudar a sus padres con los gastos de la casa, mejorar las condiciones, dejar de pasar necesidades, quiere prosperar, formar una familia y con su negocio tener como mantenerlos y alimentarlos.
William actualmente y de manera cordial quiere solicitar un préstamo para iniciar su negocio, con el capital comprara una cerda de cría.
texts.en:
William is a 23-year-old young man who seeks out opportunities to prove himself. That's why he wants to request a loan to start a business raising pigs. His main reason is that he wants to help his parents with the household expenses and improve their living conditions, so that they will no longer have to go without. He wants to prosper and start a family, and with his business he will have a way to provide for them and put food on the table.

Now, William cordially would like to request a loan to start his business. With the funds, he will buy a breeding sow.

loans.use: to start a business raising pigs.

loans.name: Mavjuda

texts.ru: Прекрасная женщина на фотографии Мавчуда. Ей 64 года. Она живет одна. Ее дочери вышли замужем и живут отдельно. У Мавчуды только дочери, сына нет. Она из города Худжанд. Мавчуда занимается приготовлением пирожки. Она печет мясная и картофельные вкусные пирожки. Мавчуда имеет точки продажи возле школы. Школьникам очень нравиться ее пирожки. Мавчуда опытный повар. Она хочет запасти мук для приготовления тесто и на часть кредита хочет приобрести холодильник. У нее не имеется холодильник для фарш и картофель. Фарш и картофель портится без холодильник. И Мавчуды придется покупать еще мясо и картофель. Ей так не выгодно. С такими планами Мавчуда обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en: The wonderful woman in the photograph is Mavjuda. She is 64 years old. She lives alone. Her daughters have got married and live separately. Mavjuda only has daughters. She does not have a son. She is from the city of Khujand. Mavjuda makes pies. She bakes delicious meat and potato pies. Mavjuda has a sales point by a school. The school pupils really like her pies. Mavjuda is an experienced cook. She wants to stock up on flour to make dough and she wants to buy a refrigerator with part of the loan. She does not have a refrigerator for her ground meat and potatoes. Ground meat and potatoes spoil without a refrigerator, and Mavjuda has to buy more meat and potatoes. This is not profitable for her. Mavjuda has applied for a loan with these plans.

loans.use: to buy flour and a refrigerator.

loans.name: Alhaji Iliya

texts.en:
Alhaji Iliya is a maize farmer from Magami village. As a Babban Gona member, Alhaji Iliya is excited to have access to a trained agronomist and superior inputs that will give him the chance to achieve high yields of up to 8 Metric Tones of Maize per Hectare of land, 5.5 times higher than the average Nigerian farmer.

Before joining Babban Gona, Alhaji Iliya would have had to sell his maize at harvest, when the price of maize is at it’s lowest, to meet his immediate cash needs.

Alhaji Iliya will use this loan to store the maize he harvests, enabling him to delay it’s sale until a later period in the season when he can obtain the best price for his maize at a premium of up to 37% higher than the market price.

Thanks to the support from Babban Gona’s marketing services, Alhaji Iliya no longer feels the pressure to sell his maize at low harvest prices. With the opportunity to earn up to $2000/Ha, Alhaji Iliya hopes to realize better yields and plans on using his additional income to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating the pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Yen's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Yen, 35 years old, is a Thai ethnic woman. She currently lives with her husband and her son in Mai Son district, Son La province.
Her family’s main income is from her husband’s salary so the income is just enough to cover the living expense of the family. Her son is at primary school and she wants to pay for her son’s education fee but the saved amount is not enough. Therefore, she needs a loan for this purpose.
Yen hopes that the loan amount will help her son have good experience for learning. She will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI.

loans.use: to pay for her son’s education fee

loans.name: Vololoniaina Eliane

texts.fr:
Vololoniaina a 40 ans, elle est divorcée. Son ex mari ne l’aide pas sur le plan financier. Son fils unique a 9 ans et est en classe de 9ème dans une école privée. 
C’est une femme animée d’un esprit d’entreprise et d’une bonne volonté pour réaliser les objectifs qu’elle s’est fixés. C'est une femme débrouillarde et courageuse. Elle a commencé la coiffure en 2013. Avant , elle travaillait dans une entreprise franche, mais en raison du niveau de salaire, elle a abandonné. Elle a aussi ouvert une petite gargote  mais en raison de la concurrence, elle a fermé. Néanmoins, l’épargne constituée lui a permis de suivre une formation en coiffure en 2010. Elle travaillait comme aide coiffeuse en 2011 et, a ouvert son propre salon de coiffure en 2013. Elle est à son deuxième prêt pour développer l’activité. Le se trouve à son domicile.
Elle prévoit d’ouvrir une école de formation professionnelle en coiffure. La construction d’une maison et l‘éducation de son enfant constituent ses priorités.
texts.en:
Vololoniaina is 40 years old and divorced. Her ex husband does not offer her any financial help. He only son is 9 years old and is in 4th grade in a private school.

Vololoniaina is animated with an entrepreneurial spirit and the good will to realize the goals she has made for herself. She is a resourceful and courageous woman. She started hairstyling in 2013. Before, she was working in an open enterprise, but because of the salary level, she had to leave. She also opened up a little greasy spoon, but because of rivalry, she closed down. Nevertheless, the savings she earned allowed her to take a hairstyling course in 2010. She worked as an assistant in 2011 and opened her own salon in 2013. She is on her second loan for developing her business. She runs the salon out of her home.

She plans to open a school for professional cosmetology, but building a house and her children's education are her top priorities.

loans.use: to buy materials - blow dryers and irons - and products - masks, serums, shampoos.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.ru: Насиба, 53 года, в разводе, есть 3 детей. Образование у Насибы средне-специальное,  по специальности она агроном, с 1985 года работает в лаборатории. Ежемесячная заработная плата составляет 6,490 сом (KGS). Насиба решила перестроить свой дом, поэтому она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 31,000 сом (KGS) на покупку шифера, досок и прочего. Свои доходы Насиба планирует вложить в дальнейшее улучшение жилищных условий, также хочет накопить на обучение дочери в университете.
texts.en: Nasiba is 53 years old, divorced, and has three children. Nasiba has a secondary vocational education. She is an agronomist by profession. She has been working in a laboratory since 1985. Her monthly wage is 6,490 som (KGS). Nasiba has decided to rebuild her house and so she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 31,000 som (KGS) to buy slate, boards and other materials. Nasiba plans to invest her income in further improving her living conditions, and she also wants to save up for her daughter's university education.

loans.use: to buy slate, boards and other materials to repair her house.

loans.name: Esther Julia

texts.es:
Esther mujer, pujante, trabajadora, amante del campo y los animales, una persona nacida y criada en los sectores rurales de Momil, llena de energía, de ganas de progreso. Vive en unión libe con su pareja, es madre de 5 hijos, se dedica a la cría de animales como ganado, cerdos, pollos, en la foto en la parte de atrás tiene el estanque de peces, múltiples actividades que desempeña con su pareja y que gracias a los ingresos que generan mantienen a su abundante familia.
A sus 38 años de edad se ha trazado como objetivo principal heredar el negocio a sus hijos y que sus terrenos se vuelvan el medio de sustento para varias generaciones de su familia.
Esther quiere solicitar un préstamo para dinamizar y hacer énfasis en la cría de cerdos y pollos, consciente que se acerca la temporada de mayor venta de estos dos animales, con el dinero comprara alimento, cerdos y pollos.
texts.en:
Esther is a vigorous, hard-working woman who loves the land and animals. She was born and raised in the rural area of Momil. She is full of energy and has the desire to get ahead in life. She lives in a common-law marriage with her partner and she has five children. She makes a living by raising animals, such as livestock, pigs, and chickens. She also has a fishpond, which can be seen in the background of the photo. There are many different forms of work that she does with her partner and the income from this work means she can support her large family.

At 38 years of age, she has decided that her main goal is to bequeath the business to her children and make the land a means of support for several generations of her family.

Esther wants to take out a loan to breathe new life into her business of raising pigs and chickens. She is aware that the season in which these two types of animals are most sold is approaching. She will use the money to buy animal feed, pigs, and chickens.

loans.use: to buy animal feed to fatten up her chickens and pigs

loans.name: Danahan

texts.ru: Данахан, 52 года, замужем, мать 6 детей. С 1991 года она занимается животноводством и полеводством. На сегодня в хозяйстве имеет 3 коровы. На 0,46 Га собственной и 1,0 Га арендованной земли выращивает арбузы, кукурузу, помидоры, занимается садоводством, выращивая яблоки, вишни, абрикосы и прочее для реализации. Семья помогает по хозяйству. Доход Данахан в среднем 6,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для откорма и реализации. В будущем она хочет и дальше развивать свой бизнес и построить новый дом для семьи.
texts.en: Danahan is 52, married, and the mother of six children.  She has been involved in animal husbandry and agriculture since 1991 and she currently has three cows on her farm.  She also uses 0.46 hectares of her own land and one hectare of leased land to grow watermelons, corn and tomatoes, and to tend to an orchard where she grows apples, cherries, apricots, and other fruits for resale.  The whole family helps her with the farm work.  Danahan earns an average of 6,000 som (KGS) per month.  She has turned to Kiva's partner, Bai Tushum Bank, to request a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) and buy some livestock for fattening and resale.  In the future, she would like to further grow her business and build a new house for her family.

loans.use: to buy some livestock for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Laufa

texts.en:
Laufa is a 56-year-old mother with 6 children. She runs a small business of selling taro and bananas in her village to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than 3 years.

Laufa requested a loan to buy taro roots (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, a rake, a shovel, banana tubes (seedlings), and chemicals to help her run the business. She hopes to use her profit to expand her business and provide for her family's needs. She became a member of SPBD in 2007.

loans.use: to buy taro roots, a wheelbarrow, a rake, a shovel, banana tubes, and chemicals.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: Maria is a 38-year-old mother with five children. She owns and operates a small business selling pancakes, pork cakes, and buns in her community to earn a living. Maria requested a loan to buy a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, a wooden spoon, and a fry pan to assist her run the business. She will use her profit to expand her business. She joined SPBD in 2012.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, a wooden spoon, and a fry pan

loans.name: Telesia

texts.en: Telesia is a 51-year-old mother with three children. She owns and operates a small business of cooking and selling BBQ in her community to earn a living. Telesia requested a loan to buy a box of chicken, a box of sausage, mushroom soy sauce, onions, plates, aluminum foil, bananas, and a sack of rice to help her run the business. She will expand her business using her profit. She became a member of SPBD in 2012.

loans.use: to buy a box of chicken, a box of sausage, mushroom soy sauce, onions, plates, aluminum foil, bananas, and a sack of rice

loans.name: Enkhbayar

texts.en:
Mr. Enkhbayar is 37-years-old and lives with his wife and two children in Erdenet, the third largest city of Mongolia. He has been working as an engineer at a flour mill since 2013. His wife is currently unemployed and stays at home, looking after their youngest child.

Their daughter studies at high school. Using his previous loan, he paid tuition fees for his daughter in 2014. Now he is requesting a loan of 1,200 USD to pay the 2015 high school tuition fees for his daughter.

loans.use: to pay his daughter's tuition fees.

loans.name: Dilfuza

texts.ru: Это женщина Дилафруз. Ей 41 лет. Она разведена с мужем. Дилфуза мать двоих детей. У нее один 19 летный сын и 14 летняя дочка. Дилфуза образованная, активная и заботливая женщина. Она работает медсестрой в больнице. 7 лет назад Дилфуза закончила мед колледж.  После окончания колледж Дилфуза начала свою работу в больнице. У нее больше опыт работы. Дилфуза любить помогать людям и ухаживать о пациентам.  Дилфуза решила отремонтировать свой кабинет. Ее кабинет настоящий момент без ремонта. Он хочет улучшить свое место работы. Из-за нехватки денег Дилфуза просит Вас дать ей кредит. За счет кредита она купить стройматериалы. Она заранее выражает сою благодарность.
texts.en:
This woman is Dilfuza. She is 41 years old. She is divorced from her husband. Dilfuza is the mother of two children. She has a 19-year-old son and a 14-year-old daughter. Dilfuza is an educated, active and caring woman. She works as a nurse in a hospital. Dilfuza graduated from medical college seven years ago. After completing college, Dilfuza began working in the hospital. She has great work experience. Dilfuza loves to help people and look after patients.

Dilfuza has decided to renovate her office. At the moment her office is unrenovated. She wants to improve her place of work. Dilfuza is asking you to give her a loan due to a lack of funds. She will buy some construction materials with the loan. She expresses her gratitude in advance.

loans.use: to buy some construction materials to renovate her office.

loans.name: Alhaji Idris

texts.en:
Alhaji Idris is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Alhaji Idris has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land (5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer).

Before joining Babban Gona, Alhaji Idris would have had to sell his maize at harvest - a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market - to meet his immediate cash needs. With the help of this loan, Alhaji Idris can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest. As a Babban Gona member, Alhaji Idris will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2,000/hectare.

Alhaji Idris is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to ensure that all his children get a university education.

loans.use: To buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Alhaji

texts.en:
Alhaji is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Alhaji has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer. Before joining Babban Gona, Alhaji would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs.

With the help of this loan, Alhaji can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest. As a Babban Gona member, Alhaji will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2,000/ha. Alhaji is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to become a better farmer.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Lalao Olga

texts.fr:
Olga a 47 ans, elle est mariée. Son mari perçoit une pension mensuelle qui ne couvre pas les dépenses mensuelles du ménage. Le nombre d’enfants sont de deux (19-15 ans) dont l’ainé vient de réussir son baccalauréat, et le dernier est en classe de seconde dans une école publique.
Elle a commencé à vendre des légumes en 1990. Les prêts obtenus lui ont permis de diversifier les produits et d’augmenter le stock (légumes, poissons séchés). Elle produit également des beignets de bananes pour les revendre. Avant, elle partageait l'étalage avec une amie pour la vente, et actuellement, elle dispose à elle seule le point de vente.
L’objectif est d’être autonome dans l’exercice de cette activité et de pouvoir éduquer les enfants.
texts.en:
Olga is 47 years old and married. Her husband receives a monthly pension that does not cover the monthly expenses of their home. They have two children (15 and 19 years old), the eldest of which just passed his national entrance examinations and the younger one is in his sophomore year at a public school.

Olga started to sell beans in 1990. The loans she received allowed her to diversify her product and to increase her inventory (beans, dried fish). She also makes banana beignet (friend dough pastries) for sale. Previously, she shared the stall with a friend for sales, and now she does everything herself.

Her goal is to be autonomous in her business practices and to be able to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy bananas, beans, eggs, and dried fish.

loans.name: Bayarmagnai

texts.en: Bayarmagnai, 45 years old, lives with his family in Erdenet, the third largest city of Mongolia. He has been transporting goods between provinces since 2007. The house his family lives in has deteriorated over the years and it needs urgent repair. So he is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD to buy building materials such as bricks, cement, fiberglass and foam for the house renovation. By doing so, his family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned, releasing less pollutants into air.

loans.use: to renovate his house in order to burn less coal for heating

loans.name: William Alfredo

texts.es:
William, es un hombre soltero que vive con su madre y su hermana, él es la cabeza del hogar, ya que es el único hombre que respalda a su familia, se dedica a la venta de granos básicos y su jornada laboral la comienza a partir de las 8:00 a.m. hasta las 6:00 p.m. 
Con el crédito William pretende invertirlo en la compra de maíz, frijoles y cereales, ya que por tratarse de insumos diarios son de gran comercialización, además incluira nuevos productos; su objetivo es aumentar las ganancias, atraer más clientes y poder fortalecer su negocio para poderle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
William sueña con agrandar su negocio y poder realizar la adquisición de un vehículo, el cual le será de gran ayuda para la actividad económica a  la que el de dedica.
texts.en:
William is a single man who lives with his mother and sister. He is the head of the household because he is the only man supporting the family. He works selling staple grains, and his workday runs from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.

William intends to invest this loan in buying corn, beans, and grains, since they are daily supplies with a strong market. He will also include new products. His objectives are to increase his profits, attract new customers, and develop his business in order give his family a better quality of life.

William's dream is to expand his business and be able to acquire a vehicle, which will be very helpful for his business.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, and grains, daily supplies with a strong market.

loans.name: Madina

texts.ru: Мадина, 57 лет, замужем. У них с мужем 2 детей. Мадина работает семейным врачом и получает заработную плату в размере 9,900 сом (KGS), также получает пенсию. Супруг работает бухгалтером. Суммарный доход семьи Мадины - 25,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Мадина решила отремонтировать сарай для скота и приобрести 2 коров. Она планирует начать и развить животноводческую деятельность, увеличив тем самым доходы семьи. В Банк «Бай –Тушум» Мадина обратилась за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS). Доходы от кредита Мадина планирует вложить в покупку земельного участка.
texts.en: Madina is 57 years old and married. She and her husband have two children. Madina works as a family doctor and receives a salary of 9,900 som (KGS), and she also receives a pension. Her spouse works as an accountant. The total income of Madina's family is 25,000 som (KGS) per month. Madina has decided to repair her livestock barn and buy two cows. She plans to start and develop an animal rearing business, thus increasing her family's income. Madina has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 120,000 som (KGS). Madina plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in buying a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to repair her livestock barn and to purchase two cows.

loans.name: Zhumagul

texts.ru: Жумагул, 24 года, не замужем, детей нет. У Жумагул - среднее образование. С 2013 года занимается животноводством и полеводством, у нее развитое хозяйство. Есть 1 корова, 1 овца, на 1,14 Га земли она выращивает кукурузу. Ежемесячный доход от ведения бизнеса составляет до 13,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жумагул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на сбор урожая экологически-чистой кукурузы и оплату осенне-полевых работ. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса и улучшение благосостояния ее семьи.
texts.en: Zhumagul is 24 years old, unmarried, and has no children. Zhumagul has a secondary education. She has been rearing animals and growing crops since 2013. She has a well-developed farm. She has one cow and one sheep, and she grows corn on 1.14 hectares of land. The monthly income from running her business is up to 13,000 som (KGS). In order to develop her business further, Zhumagul has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to gather her harvest of organic corn and to pay for fall field work. She plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further development of her business and the improvement of her family's well-being.

loans.use: to pay for the harvesting of her organic corn.

loans.name: Hamisu

texts.en:
Hamisu is a maize farmer from Tsohuwan Rikochi village. As a member of Babban Gona, Hamisu is excited about the opportunity to become a better farmer.

With Babban Gona’s support, he has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land (5.5 times the average yield in Nigeria). Before joining Babban Gona, Hamisu would have had to sell his maize at harvest - a period when maize prices are at their lowest - to meet his immediate cash needs.

With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Hamisu can store his maize and sell it in the future for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest. Hamisu is grateful to be part of the Babban Gona family and in the end hopes to use his increased earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: To buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Ana Victoria

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer fuerte, de gran carácter, una persona decidida, enfocada en sus propósitos, una mujer de principios, madre de dos pequeños de 10 y 6 años de edad que se dedica a la cría de ganado porcino, actividad que adoptó por gusto ya que no le gusta ser una mantenida y que tenga que pedir dinero para comprar algo para ella y sus hijos, prefiere tener su capital para satisfacer sus necesidades y deseos.
Ana se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual quiere invertir en cerdos, alimento, vitaminas, vacunas y materiales para la construcción de un porqueriza, (cemento, zinc, arena y madera).
Esta inversión la quiere realizar para mejorar sus ingresos y por ende la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Ana is a strong woman of great character; a motivated woman, focused in her goals, a woman of principles. She is the mother of two young children, ages 10 and 6, who works raising pigs. She started this job because she wanted it, since she likes to be independent and not have to ask for money to buy something for herself and her children. She prefers to have her capital to satisfy her needs and wishes. Ana is requesting a loan to buy pigs, feed, vitamins, vaccinations and building materials to build a pig stall (cement, zinc, sand and wood). She wants to do this investment to improve her income and therefore, her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pigs, feed, vitamins, vaccination and materials (cement, zinc, sand and wood)

loans.name: Bibigul

texts.ru: Бибигул живет на районе Джоми. Ей 52 года. У нее двоих детей и одна невестка. Муж Бибигул дехканин. Он занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельности. Бибигул родилась, выросла в семье дехканов и вышла замуж на дехканин. Бибигул вместе с невесткой выращивает мелко рогатого скота. В течение 15 лет Бибигул занята животноводческой деятельности. Она покупает молодых телят и откармливает их несколько месяцев, потом перепродает на скотном рынке. Сын Бибигул занимается таксистом на районе. Бибигул готовиться к свадьбе дочери. Ее дочка выходит замуж. У Бибигул не хватает денежных средство для купли свадебных средств. По этой причине Бибигул обратилась за кредитом. Запрашиваемый кредит поможет ей успешно проводить свадьбы дочери.
texts.en: Bibigul lives in the Jomi region. She is 52 years old. She has two children and a daughter-in-law. Bibigul's husband is a farmer. He is engaged in agriculture. Bibigul was born and raised in a farming family and married a farmer. Bibigul and her daughter-in-law rear cattle. Bibigul has been rearing animals for 15 years. She buys young calves and fattens them up for a few months, then resells them at the livestock market. Bibigul's son is a taxi driver in the local area. Bibigul is preparing for her daughter's wedding. Her daughter is getting married. Bibigul does not have enough funds to buy things for the wedding. For this reason Bibigul has applied for a loan. The requested loan will help her to conduct her daughter's wedding successfully.

loans.use: to buy things for her daughter's wedding.

loans.name: Miriama

texts.en:
Miriama is a 23-year-old mother with two children. She runs a small business selling taro and banana in her village to earn a living. Miriama requested a loan to buy taro roots (seedlings), banana tube (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, rake, shovel, and hand gloves to help her run her business. She will use her profit to expand her business.

Miriama became a member of South Pacific Business Development in 2015.

loans.use: to buy taro roots (seedlings), banana tube (seedlings), a wheelbarrow, rake, shovel, and hand gloves

loans.name: Alexander Jose

texts.es:
Alexander es un hombre soñador, una persona trabajadora que nunca le ha gustado ser y sentirse como empleado, desde joven mostro actitudes de emprendedor, de independiente y por ello adoptó hace varios años la cría de cerdos como su actividad principal, apoyándose de los conocimientos que le fueron inculcados desde pequeño con respecto a la cría de animales y al vivir en una zona conocida por esta actividad.
Alexander es soltero no tiene hijos, mantiene a su familia, principalmente a sus padres, paga las medicinas, la alimentación y los servicios públicos.
Alexander se encuentra buscando un apoyo económico para comprar cerdos, una medida que quiere adoptar para estar a la par de la competencia, pues los precios en el mercado están bastante difíciles de sostener y no se puede quedar atrás.
Con el dinero busca comprar cerdos, alimentos, vacunas y vitaminas, espera que la inversión ayude a mejorar sus ventas y satisfacer las necesidades de los clientes.
texts.en:
Alexander is a dreamer. He is a hard-working person that has never liked to be or feel like an employee. Since he was young he showed entrepreneurial and independent attitudes, and from this he started raising pigs a few years ago as his main occupation. He supports himself with the knowledge that was instilled in him since he was a boy with respect to raising pigs, and by living in an area known for this occupation.

Alexander is single and does not have children. He supports his family, mainly his parents. He pays for medicines, food, and public services. Alexander finds himself looking for financial support to buy pigs as a measure he wants to take in order to keep up with the competition. The prices in the market are rather difficult to sustain, and he cannot fall behind.

With the loan, he will buy pigs, food, vaccines and vitamins. He hopes that this investment helps to improve his sales and satisfy the needs of the customers.

loans.use: to supply his pigsty with pigs.

loans.name: Voeun

texts.en:
As a farmer from Batheay District, Kampong Cham Province, Voeun, a 45-year-old woman, works very hard on the rice field near her house. She is a single woman, who lives with her mother. She can earn approximately $2.50 per day in her line of business. Farming has been her primary source of income for more than twenty years.

In this farming season, she lacks capital to buy certain farm supplies. To continue her farming operations, Voeun is seeking to borrow some money from Kiva to buy farm supplies, such as fertilizers, seeds, insecticides, and other related materials. She hopes that the loan proceeds will help to improve her living conditions. She is thankful to all lenders for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies (e.g., fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides).

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en:
Sokha is a 47-year-old married rice farmer with three children. She resides in the Takeo Province of Cambodia. To earn a living to support her family, she cultivates rice. She explains that she has been in this line of work since 2000. Her husband is a 47-year-old Tuk Tuk taxi driver. Two of her children are factory workers. Together, they earn approximately $22 per day.

This is her second loan cycle with Kiva. Currently, her husband’s motorcycle is old. Therefore, she is seeking a loan to buy a motorcycle for her husband to run as a Tuk Tuk taxi service. With this loan, she will able to have sufficient funds to buy a motorcycle for her husband and to thereby generate more income to support the family. In the future, she plans on building a new house.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for her husband to run as a Tuk Tuk taxi service.

loans.name: Eseta

texts.en:
Eseta is a 37-year-old mother with eight children. She runs a small convenience store in her village to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than four years.

Eseta requested a loan to buy a freezer, box of chicken, sack of flour, sack of rice, box of tinned fish, box of vegetable oil, box of milk, box of sausage, and plastic bags to help her run the business. She became a member of South Pacific Business Development in 2010.

loans.use: to buy a freezer, box of chicken, sack of flour, sack of rice, box of tinned fish, box of vegetable oil, box of milk, box of sausage, and plastic bags

loans.name: Chamroeun

texts.en:
Chamroeun is 43 years old. She is married and lives with three children in Takeo province, Cambodia. Her husband is 48 years old, a motor taxi driver. One of her children is a factory worker and another one attends school. Together, they can earn approximately $12 per day.

Chamroeun has been involved in animal husbandry for more than one year. She has extensive experience and is successful in her career. Chamroeun is involved in raising pigs and poultry. She is requesting a loan because she wants to buy cows to fatten and breed for calves to sell. With the loan, she will be able to improve her family’s finances. For her future plans, she is going to build a new proper house and help her children to earn higher education.

loans.use: to buy cows to fatten and breed for calves to sell.

loans.name: Appolonia

texts.en:
Appolonia is a 44-year-old woman with four children. To earn a living, she owns and operates a small business, where she sells elei printing materials at the market. She explains that she has been engaged in this business for more than 5 years.

Appolonia is requesting a loan to buy various materials, including rolling materials, paint colors, paint brushes, elei designs, containers, and a printing machine, to help her run the business. She plans on using the profits generated from the loan to expand her business. She became a member of SPBD in 2008.

loans.use: to purchase various materials (e.g., rolling materials, paint colors, paint brushes, elei designs, containers, and a printing machine) for her business.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es:
Verónica se sigue dedicando a su negocio , que consiste en vender productos naturales tradicionales,es una actividad muy difundida en el Cusco , ella es muy trabajadora y quiere salir adelante por su familia.
la socia necesita el préstamo para comprar plantas y productos tradicionales. ella  desea tener un local donde pueda trabajar de mejor forma.ella esta contenta con el préstamo que le facilito KIVA , por que así seguirá invirtiendo en su negocio y lograra su meta, también se compromete a cumplir sus pagos puntualmente.
texts.en:
Veronica continues to operate her business which consists of selling natural and traditional products. This is a very widespread occupation in Cusco. She is very hard-working and wants to move her family ahead.

Veronica is requesting a loan to buy plants and traditional products. She wants to open a store where she can work better. She is pleased with the loan that Kiva made possible because she can keep investing in her business and she will reach her goal. She also promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy plants and traditional products.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is a 55-year-old married woman with six children. She works very hard to provide for her family.

To earn a living, she runs a general store in the Philippines. Alma explains that she has been in this business for 5 years.

She is now requesting a loan in the amount of 30,000 PHP through NWTF to buy items to sell, such as shampoo, soaps, milk, sugar, and eggs. She would like to save enough money to provide a better future for her family.

loans.use: to expand her inventory by purchasing various items (e.g., shampoo, soaps, milk, sugar, and eggs).

loans.name: Tasiú

texts.en:
Tasiú is maize farmer from the Fulani Gimba village. As a member of Babban Gona, Tasiú is excited about the opportunity to become a better farmer. With Babban Gona’s support, he has the oppotrtunity to attain yields of up to 8 metric tons of maize per hectare of land, which would represent 5.5 times the average yield in Nigeria.

Before joining Babban Gona, Tasiú would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest levels, to meet his immediate cash needs, such as food and clothing for his family. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Tasiú can store his maize and sell it in the future for up to 37% higher prices than the market price at harvest.

Tasiú is grateful to be part of the Babban Gona family and in the end hopes to use his increased earnings to ensure that all his children get a university education.

loans.use: to eliminate the pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest by purchasing food and clothing for his family.

loans.name: Osoria

texts.pt:
Nasceu Namaacha província de Maputo tem 33 anos de idade, é viúva mãe de 3 filhos que se encontram a estudar, responsabiliza-se pela sua irmã que vive em sua casa.
Começou a trabalhar com Hluvuku em 2013, este é o seu 3º empréstimo na Hluvuku com o qual pretende adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, varões e mais para terminar a sua obra de residência.
Futuramente pretende iniciar um negócio de criação de frangos para venda. O seu maior desafio é dar continuidade com os seus estudos até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
Osoria was born in Namaacha, province of Maputo. She is 33 years old. She is a widow and mother of three children currently going to school. She is also responsible for her sister who lives with her.
She started working with Hluvuku in 2013. This is their third loan with them and she wants to use it to buy construction material such as sand, cement, rods and other items to finish building her home.
In the future, she wants to start a business raising chickens to sell. Her biggest challenge has been to continue with her higher education.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, rod and other items to finish building her home

loans.name: Mariamo

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Maputo, tem 67 anos de idade, viúva mãe de 3 filhos maiores de idade, responsabiliza-se pelo seu neto que vive em sua casa.
Começou trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2010, este é o seu 4º empréstimo na Hluvuku com o qual pretende adquirir material construção como: areia, cimento, ferro e blocos, para fazer o murro de vedação da sua residência.
Futuramente pretende concluir a sua obra de construção de murro e ampliar o seu estabelecimento comercial
texts.en:
Mariamo was born in Maputo. She is 67 years old. She is a widow and mother of 3 children of age. She is responsible for her grandson who lives with her.
She began working with Hluvuku in 2010. This is her fourth loan with them and she wants to use it to buy construction material such as sand, cement, iron and bricks to build a wall around her home.
In the future, she intends to finish the construction works for this wall and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, iron and bricks

loans.name: Cecil

texts.en:
Cecil is 30 years old. She is married and has three children, two of whom are in school.

Cecil raises pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a 16,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Cecil has been raising pigs for the past 7 years and she has taken out 9 previous loans from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Cecil would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Ainagul

texts.ru: Айнагул, 59 лет, вдова, мать 2 детей. У нее среднее образование, уже много лет Айнагул занимается сельским хозяйством. У нее есть 4 коровы, 10 овец и 4,48 Га земли, где Айнагул выращивает фасоль для реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 14,000 сом (KGS), этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айнагул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS), полученные средства она направит на покупку коровы. Доходы от кредита помогут Айнагул в будущем развить ее бизнес и построить баню.
texts.en:
Ainagul is 59 and a widow with two children. She has a high school education and has been working in farming for many years. She has four cows and 10 sheep on her farm as well as 4.48 hectares of land where she grows beans for sale. Her monthly income is about 14,000 KGS, which isn't enough to cover the cost of living.

With the goal of further developing her farm, Ainagul has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 40,000 KGS to purchase a cow. Profits from the loan will allow her to develop her business in the future and to build a bathhouse.

loans.use: to buy a cow in order to increase her income

loans.name: Felisberta

texts.en:
Felisberta is 66 years old and married with eight children. She works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines. Felisberta has been in this business for three years.

Felisberta requested a 35,000 Philippine peso loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation to buy more items to sell like soap, milk, noodles, etc. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like soap, milk, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Mayerling

texts.es:
Mayerling una mujer soltera cabeza de familia de 35 años de edad, una persona emprendedora, inteligente, capaz, una persona perseverante que día a día trabaja para mejorar su situación económica.
Ella tiene un negocio de distribuidora, el cual constituyo en el año 2013.
Mayerling actualmente tiene una dificultad latente en su negocio, el techo donde tiene ubicado los objetos esta averiado y cuando llueve se filtran goteras que dañan su mercancía generando pérdidas.
Pensando en erradicar este problema de raíz, la señora quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de materiales para reparar el tejado de su casa, también busca abastecerse de productos  de papelería, refrescos y productos de la canasta familiar.
texts.en:
Mayerling is a single woman and the head of the family.  She is 35 years old, an entrepreneurial, intelligent, and capable person.  She is a persevering person who works everyday to improve her economic situation.  

She has a distributing business, which she started in 2013.  Now Mayerling has a latent difficulty in her business: the roof where she keeps her products is broken; and when it rains, it leaks and damages her merchandise generating loss.
