Su negocio es la elaboración de queso artesanal, diariamente recoge leche de su ganado hasta juntar la cantidad necesaria para añadirle zumo de limón y elaborar queso, “empecé mi negocio hace 8 años, trabajo con mi hija...” comenta. la ventaja de su negocio es que es muy conocida en el lugar y los clientes vienen de la ciudad para comprarle, la desventaja es la falta de alimento para el ganado para que produzcan leche. Su sueño es mejorar la producción lechera y de queso, ella desea comprar alimento para ganado. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 8 años que realiza esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Elena solicita un préstamo para comprar alimento para ganado para mejorar la producción de queso.
texts.en:
Elena is a 49-year old woman. She is married and has a 16-year old daughter. Her business is in cheese production She is friendly, a good person and very hard-working. She carries out her business in the "karhuiza" place, near the sacred Lake Titicaca. The people of this place work in agriculture and fishing, making it a very popular tourist spot.

Elena is dark-skinned, with a short stature and dressed traditionally. Her native language is Aymará which she speaks at home and she speaks Spanish in her business. She shares her life with her husband who works fattening cattle, and with her daughter who is in school and grazes livestock. Her business is making artesanal cheese. Every day she gets milk from her cattle until she gets the amount that she needs to add lemon juice and make cheese. "I started my business 8 years ago. I work with my daughter..." she says.

The advantage of her business is that it is very well-known in the area and the customers come from the city to buy from her. The disadvantage is the lack of food for the cattle so that they can produce milk. Her dream is to improve the milk and cheese production. She wants to buy food for the cattle.

This is the first loan sequence with the institution in the 8 years that she has been doing this job. It is for these reasons that Elena is asking for a loan to buy food for the cattle to improve cheese production.

loans.use: to buy food for the cattle to improve cheese production.

loans.name: Leidy Carolina

texts.es:
Leidy es una hermosa joven, una persona estudiosa, carismática, trabajadora la cual está fabricando sus propias oportunidades laborales, se dedica a prestar sus servicios de artes gráficas y publicidad, apoyándose de sus conocimientos adquiridos estudiando dicha profesión.
Ahora Leidy se encuentra solicitando un préstamo, el cual quiere invertir en la compra de una sublimadora, insumos y elementos, esto le permitirá mejorar su profesión. 
Su sueño a futuro es comprar vivienda, conformar una familia y crecer profesionalmente.
Esto lo podrá lograr con la ayuda del préstamo pues dichos insumos y elementos le permitirán ofrecer un producto nuevo que es la impresión, sostenibilidad del negocio, optimizar la operación de su negocio, ser más competitivo y mejorar su punto de venta.
texts.en:
Leidy is a young girl. She is a studious, charismatic, and hard-working, which is shown in her own work opportunities. She loans her services to graphic arts and publishing, supporting herself with her acquired knowledge studying in this profession.

Now Leidy finds herself asking for a loan, which she will invest into buying a sublimation machine, supplies and elements to allow her to improve her profession. Her future dream is to buy a house, start a family and to grow professionally. She will achieve this with the help of a loan because those supplies and elements will allow her to offer a new product which is impression, have sustainability of the business, optimize the operation of her business, be more competitive, and improve her sales points.

loans.use: to buy a sublimation machine and supplies to make her business parts.

loans.name: Luz Mary

texts.es:
Luz Mary es una estilista con largos años de trayectoria, una mujer de la vieja escuela, la cual al o largo de su recorrido ha adquirido el cariño y la fidelidad de muchos clientes que la frecuentan y solo se deja tocar su cabello de ella.
Vive en unión libre con su pareja, con la cual tuvo 4 hijos, mayores de edad.
Actualmente se encuentras solicitando un préstamo para abastecerse de químicos y productos para aplicar a sus clientes.
Su principal objetivo es trabajar, mantener su calidad de vida y no tener que depender de una persona para darse algún gusto o cubrir una necesidad.
texts.en:
Luz Mary is a stylist with many years of experience. She is an old-school woman, who, along the journey, has acquired the affection and loyalty of many customers, that come to see her frequently and only let their hair be touched by her.

She lives together with her partner, with whom she has four adult children.

Now she is requesting a loan to stock up on chemicals and products to apply to her customers.

Her main goal is to work, maintain her quality of life, and not depend on another person to give her anything or cover any of her expenses.

loans.use: to stock up on chemicals and products to apply to her customers.

loans.name: Neidy Ximena

texts.es:
Neidy es una mujer de 26 años de edad, amante de la tecnología, los animes y el manga, constituyo un negocio de alquiler de videojuegos y venta de productos todos relacionados con el anime y el manga, un negocio que ha estado dando mucho frutos, pues el internet a acercado a los jóvenes con estas producciones japonesas que se han vuelto tan virales.
Actualmente Neidy se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de una consola Xbox-360 y compra de mercancía como películas y peluches.
Su sueño es lograr comprar una vivienda y crecer empresarialmente.
texts.en:
Neidy is a 26-year-old woman, and loves technology, animes, and mangas.

She build a business of renting out video games and sell all kinds of products related to anime and manga. This business has given her many fruits, because the internet brought these Japanese productions, that have become so viral, closer to young people.

Now Neidy is requesting a loan to buy an Xbox 360 and to buy merchandise like movies and stuffed animals.

Her goal is to buy a home and to grow as an entrepreneur.

loans.use: to buy an Xbox 360 console and to buy merchandise like movies and stuffed animals.

loans.name: Maria Adiela

texts.es:
Ella es María, una empresaria que junto con su esposo (ver foto), trabajan en un cultivo de café, una empresa familiar, donde juntos laboran por mejorar su calidad de vida, por tener el alimento en casa, junto a la cliente se encuentra su nieto, ella lo ayuda económicamente, lo ama y vela por que tenga un buen crecimiento educación y pueda continuar con las actividades agrícolas de sus abuelos y sigas esas tradiciones de sus antecesores.
Esta dulce mujer se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para acelerar el proceso de maduración del café con insumos como abonos, el motivo principal de esta decisión es que esperar sacar la mayor cantidad de producto antes que el fenómeno del niño arrase con la cosecha.
texts.en:
This is María, a businesswoman who, with her husband (see photo), works growing coffee. It is a family business where they work together to improve their quality of life, to have food in the house. Her grandson is seen with the borrower. She helps him economically, she loves him and ensures that he has good educational growth and con continue with the agricultural work of his grandparents and that he continues these traditions of his ancestors.

This sweet woman is asking for a loan to accelerate the ripening process of the coffee with supplies such as manure. The primary motivation for this decision is that she hopes to get a greater quantity of product before El Niño destroys the crop.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to ripen the coffee quickly.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
As a married mother of one child, Judith works hard to support her family.

She has a general store in the Philippines. Judith is borrowing 10,000 PHP through GDMPC in order to purchase additional stock to sell at her general store.

Judith has sustained her business activities with loans from GDMPC. She hopes her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock for her business.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María es una empresaria de 37 años de edad que a través de un préstamo busca sacar adelante su proyecto de confección de línea propia de ropa, ella es una empresaria entregada a su trabajo y a su familia que todos los días sale con la determinación de ser mejor empresa y persona, haciendo su trabajo con esmero y amor, pues cree que es la manera de obtener los mejores resultados.
EL apoyo para ella será muy determinante pues le permitirá  ponerse a punto en mercancía para atender la demanda en diciembre.
texts.en:
María is a 37-year-old businesswoman who, through a loan, seeks to advance her project of sewing her own line of clothing. She is a businesswoman committed to her work and her family who goes out each day with the determination to be a better business and person, doing her work with care and love, since she believes that this is the way to get the best results.

The support for her will be crucial because it will allow her to put her merchandise in place to meet the demand in December.

loans.use: to begin to sew her own line of clothing.

loans.name: Cristian

texts.es:
Cristian es un joven de 20 años de edad que se dedica a cultivar y la cría de ganado porcino, actividades que desempeña por gusto y vocación a las actividades agrícolas.
Cristian es padre de un pequeño de 7 meses de edad, su sueño es ser competente y auto sostenible para vivir junto con su hijo y pareja, desarrollar su actividad y hacerse conocer en el mundo agrícola.
Actualmente, el joven empresario se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas, tales como abonos riegos, fertilizantes y semillas de frijol, quiere preparar una nueva cosecha de cultivo.
texts.en:
Cristian is a young man of 20 years, who is earning a living by farming and breeding pigs. He is doing this job with great pleasure and a calling for agricultural activities.

Cristian is a father of a small child of 7 months. His goals are to be reliable and self-sustained to live with his son and his partner, to develop his business, and to make himself known in the world of agriculture.

Now, this young entrepreneur is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies like liquid fertilizers, fertilizers, and bean seeds, because he wants to grow a new crop for cultivation.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies like liquid fertilizers, fertilizers, and bean seeds.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is a 62-year-old married woman with four children.

Alicia is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Alicia requested a PHP 8000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Alicia has been in this business for 42 years now, and has borrowed 8 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Alicia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es:
Catalina continúa con su negocio de venta de calcetines. El crédito que obtuvo lo invirtió comprando calcetines por mayor, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque pudo vender toda la mercadería. Actualmente su hija sigue estudiando en la escuela, la mercadería que vendió la ayudó a pagar el material escolar que necesitaba para los estudios de su hija, “mi avanzada edad ya no me permite trabajar como antes…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que se encuentra en una zona comercial turística donde se realiza gran comercio, la desventaja es que no cuenta con una vitrina donde exponer los calcetines. Su sueño es mejorar su economía, ella desea comprar un armazón metálico armable para exponer la ropa. Esta es la 3 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 15 años que se dedica a este negocio. 
Es por esos motivos que Catalina solicita un préstamo para comprar un armazón metálico armable para exponer calcetines.
texts.en:
Catalina is continuing with her business of selling socks. With the loan that she received previously, she bought socks at wholesale. Her payments were on time because she was able to sell all of her merchandise.

Currently, her daughter is continuing her studies in school. The merchandise that Catalina sells helps to pay for the school supplies that her daughter needs. "My advanced age doesn't allow me to work like before..." she comments. The advantage of her business is that she is located in a tourist area where there is a lot of commerce. Her disadvantage is that she doesn't have a display unit for her socks.

Catalina's dream is to improve her economic situation, so she wants to buy portable metal shelving to display the clothing she sells. This is her third cycle of loans with this institution in the 15 years that she has conducted this business.

For these reasons, Catalina is requesting a loan to buy portable metal shelving to display socks.

loans.use: to buy portable metal shelving to display socks.

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es: María de 32 años de edad es madre soltera, ella hace varios años vive en casa de su propiedad junto a su madre y su hija de 12 años de edad.  María es una mujer con espíritu emprendedor, ya que desde hace mucho tiempo presta sus servicios en una empresa de educación lo que le permite brindar lo mejor que puede a su madre y su hija. María con mucho esfuerzo ha iniciado la construcción del corredor de su vivienda, pero por falta de liquidez económica no ha logrado culminarlo, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava y lámina para terminar el corredor y brindar seguridad a su hogar.
texts.en: María, 32 years old, is a single mother. For some years she has lived in a house that she owns with her mother and her 12-year-old daughter. María is a woman with an enterprising spirit, since for a log time she has worked in an education business which allows her to offer the best that she can to her mother and daughter. María, with a lot of effort, has begun the construction of the outdoor walkway of her house, but due to the lack of economic liquidity, she has not managed to finish it, so she asks FUSAI for a loan to invest in cement, sand, gravel, and metal sheeting to finish the outdoor walkway and offer security to her home.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, and metal sheeting to finish the outdoor walkway and offer security to her home.

loans.name: Glenda

texts.en: Glenda worked abroad for seven years. When she had saved enough money, she decided to return home for good. Glenda came back to the Philippines and chose to run a business. She is now operating a school supplies store. Glenda wants to expand the business by offering more products. Because of this, she is asking for a loan of P35,000 to buy paper, notebooks, ball-point pens, and other school supplies to sell. She will do her best to make higher profits to enable her to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy paper, notebooks, ball-point pens, and other school supplies to sell.

loans.name: Luzvilla

texts.en:
Luzvilla is 59 years old and married with three children.

She is in the agricultural business, raising poultry in the Philippines. Luzvilla requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her chickens.

Luzvilla has been raising poultry for 3 years now and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF, and more recently from Kiva, to sustain it.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her chickens.

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es:
Luis miguel, un hombre típico del campo, arriero, montañero, una persona humilde, trabajadora con amplía familia, vive en unión libre con su pareja y tiene 9 hijos, todos ellos menores de edad, en sus hombros carga una enorme responsabilidad ya que llevar un alimento para tantos, darles educación, vestido y techo requiere de muchos gastos.
Para Miguel es un verdadero gusto trabajar por el bien de su familia, por ello todos los días se esfuerza por mejorar como empresario para llevar más recursos a su hogar.
Actualmente Luis Miguel se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para mejorar su negocio de cría de animales y dicho dinero será invertido en la construcción de 8 porquerizas, necesita, adobes, cemento, tubos para desechos, arena, palos, telas entre otros materiales.
texts.en:
Luis Miguel, a typical man of the countryside, a mule driver, a mountaineer, a humble person, hard-working with a big family, lives in a common-law marriage with his partner and has 9 children. They are all minors, and an enormous responsibility rests on his shoulders, which is to bring food for so many, give them an education, clothing and shelter, which requires a lot of expenses.

For Miguel, it is a true pleasure to work for the good of his family, for this he works hard every day to improve as a businessman to bring more resources to his home.

Currently Luis Miguel is asking for a loan to improve his business raising animals and this money will be invested in the construction of 8 pigpens, he needs adobe, cement, waste pipes, sand. poles, fabric, and other materials.

loans.use: to build 8 pigpens, he needs adobe, cement, waste pipes, sand, poles, fabric, and other materials.

loans.name: Blanca Cecilia

texts.es:
Blanca es una empresaria de 40 años de edad que se dedica a la fabricación de muñecos de tela, una actividad en la que encontró la manera de sentirse útil en su hogar, de ser independiente económicamente, de mejorar la calidad de vida en su casa, de ofrecerle una mejor educación a sus 3 hijos adolescentes.
Aprendió a elaborar muñecos de tela asistiendo a talleres prácticos vio gran potencial en esta actividad y ahora el único impedimento que tiene para crecer y tener mayor producción de muñecos es la falta de maquinaria.
Es por esta razón que se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para completar el dinero que necesita para comprar una máquina fileteadora, con este activo su producción aumentara considerablemente permitiéndole percibir un mayor número de ingresos y la posibilidad de generar empleo.
texts.en:
Blanca is a businesswoman, 40 years old, who works making fabric dolls, work in which she has found the way to feel useful in her home, to be economically independent, to improve the quality of life in her house, and to offer a better education to her three adolescent children.

She learned to make fabric dolls by attending workshops and she saw the great potential in this work and now the only impediment that she has to growth and having more doll production is the lack of machinery.

For this reason, she is asking for a loan to complement the money that she has to purchase a serger. With this work, her production will increase considerably, allowing her to get a larger income and the possibility of generating a job.

loans.use: to purchase a serger to make her fabric dolls.

loans.name: Elsa Marina

texts.es: Elsa es habitante de la capital del país y reside en un barrio ubicado en una de sus localidades, Ella enviudó y con su trabajo ha solventado todos los gastos del hogar y los de su único hijo.  Elsa de 44 años es una comerciante que cuenta con once años de experiencia y  en sus inicios exclusivamente comercializaba ropa, sin embargo le pareció una opción más rentable abrir un almacén misceláneo en su local, en el que además de prendas de vestir ofreciera otra variedad de productos; papelería, cosméticos, aseo personal, accesorios, bisutería, detalles para toda ocasión y juguetería. Su intuición fue certera, ahora los vecinos y transeúntes, están felices de encontrar en las cercanías toda una amplia variedad de productos a excelentes precios y con el mejor servicio. Con la finalidad de surtir con nuevos diseños de ropa y papelería, realizó una solicitud de crédito, su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir este capital en un madrugon donde consigue variedad de productos a excelentes precios. Su meta a futuro es terminar de pagar su vivienda y los estudios profesionales de su hijo.
texts.en:
Elsa lives in the country's capital city, in a neighborhood located in one of its suburbs. She became a widow and with her work has paid for all the expenses for the household and her only son.

Elsa is 44 years old and is a shopkeeper with 11 years of experience. At first, she sold clothing exclusively; however, she felt a more profitable option would be to open a variety store on the premises, where not only would she have clothing items for sale, but a variety of products: stationery, cosmetics, personal hygiene items, accessories, costume jewelry, gifts for any occasion and toys. Her intuition was right on target, now her neighbors and passersby are happy to find a wide variety of products nearby at excellent prices and with the finest customer service.

With the aim of supplying her business with new styles of clothing and stationery, she applied for a loan - her first Kiva loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo - to invest this capital at an early bird sale, where she obtains a variety of merchandise at excellent prices. Her goal for the future is to pay off her house and pay for her son's professional education.

loans.use: to supply her business with new clothing styles and stationery.

loans.name: Jose Orlando

texts.es:
José con el crédito anterior pudo realizar sus actividades agrícolas, manifiesta que obtuvo perdidas por la falta de lluvia y por las plagas que invadieron los cultivos, más sin embargo cancelar su deuda, actualmente solo vive con su esposa y una hija,  otra de sus hijas ya se independizo. 
José solicita un nuevo crédito para mantenerse trabajando y  aumentar la producción de hortalizas, podrá comprar semilla mejorada de tomate, chile, ejote y pepino; además invertirá en fertilizante para poder obtener una buena cosecha y tener un ingreso económico considerable que le ayude a sacar adelante a su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José used the previous loan to keep his farm going.
He says that even though he lost crops to drought and pests, he was able to repay the loan in full.
He lives with only his wife and one daughter, since the other daughter now lives on her own.
José asks for a new loan to keep his farm going and increase vegetable production.
He will buy improved tomato, pepper, green bean, and cucumber seeds.
He will also buy fertiliser to reap a plentiful harvest and increase his income substantially, so as to give his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy improved seeds and fertiliser for a good harvest.

loans.name: Rosiris Esther

texts.es: Rosiris es una emprendedora mujer que se dedica al comercio de productos y la confección satélite de prendas de vestir, estas actividades las realiza desde la comodidad de su hogar y cuenta con 24 años de experiencia.  Su principal motivación para iniciar su negocio fue la necesidad de apoyar a su cónyuge, generando nuevos ingresos para aportar a los gastos del hogar, puesto que su familia es numerosa y cuando sus cuatro hijos estaban pequeños, emanaban gastos representativos, sobretodo en alimentación, salud, educación y así mismo necesitaba estar al pendiente de su crianza.  Ella recibió la propuesta de un empresario que conocía para maquilar prendas de vestir en su propia casa y le suministraría las materias primas necesarias para la producción, ella acepto muy entusiasta y aún continúa laborando con él. Alternamente exhibe artículos para el hogar, ropa, calzado, perfumes y cosméticos, los cuales compra en almacenes y empresas de multiniveles, los cuales ofrece a vecinos, amigos, familiares y referidos. Como los pedidos que le realizan sus clientes se incrementan significativamente por la temporada que se avecina, realizó una solicitud de crédito, su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir en ropa, calzado y artículos para el hogar. A futuro Rosiris se proyecta con mayor capital de trabajo para lograr cumplirle oportunamente a sus clientes y así incrementar sus utilidades con las que podrá realizarle adecuaciones a su vivienda y a su negocio.
texts.en:
Rosiris is an entrepreneurial woman who works in trade and independent clothes making. These jobs are done from the comfort of her home and she has 24 years of experience. Her main motivation for starting her business was the need to support her partner, getting new earnings to contribute to the household expenses. As her family is large, when her four children were small, they had representative expenses, above all in food, health, education, and thus she needed to be aware of their upbringing.

She received a proposal from an entrepreneur that she knew to assemble clothing in her own home and he supplied her with the raw materials needed for production. She accepted, very enthusiastically and still continues working with him. Alternatively she shows items for the home, clothing, shoes, perfumes and cosmetics, which she buys in the stores and multilevel companies and offers them to her neighbors, friends, family members and referrals.

Since the orders that her customers make increase significantly in the season that is coming up, she has asked for a loan, her first Credikiva through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, to buy clothing, shoes and items for the home.

In the future, Rosiris projects more job income to achieve timely delivery for her customers and thus increase her profits with which she will be able to make adaptations to her home and her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes, and items for the home.

loans.name: Jelin Patricia

texts.es: Jelin es una microempresaria que reside en un barrio de Barranquilla en compañía de su cónyuge y está muy contenta de trabajar desde su casa y poder continuar al cuidado de sus hijos que son menores de edad y deben estar bajo supervisión para lograr una óptima crianza. Ella es una confeccionista que desde muy joven aprendió este arte, sin embargo hace apenas tres años decidió abrir su propio taller en su vivienda y ofrecer públicamente sus servicios; como es una modista integral elabora todo tipo de prenda de vestir, y sus vecinos, conocidos y amigos están encantados con la calidad de sus productos, sobretodo en el diseño y acabados de las prendas. Su capacidad creativa le permitió  incorporar a su negocio una línea de peluches de personajes animados y otros de su propia invención que comercializa a almacenes misceláneos de la ciudad. También ofrece servicios de confección a todo costo y sus clientes confían en su buen gusto y experiencia, sin embargo no dispone de un capital amplio, es por ello que realizó una solicitud de crédito, su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir telas, hilos y accesorios, y poder prestar el servicio sin contratiempos.  Con el éxito que tendrá pretende a futuro adquirir nuevas máquinas de coser que le permitan agilizar su trabajo y acercase a su meta de remodelar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Jelin, a small entrepreneur, lives in Baranquilla with her husband.
She is very happy to be able to work at home in order to care for her small children and raise them properly.
She learned sewing at a very young age but opened her own workshop at her house only three years ago.
She can fulfil any type of order because she knows how to make all types of clothes.
Her neighbours, acquaintances, and friends are all very satisfied with the quality of her products: they love the design and the attention to detail.
Thanks to her creativity, Jelin also makes plushies: she draws inspiration from animated films and also creates her own designs.
She sells these to various shops in the city.
She also offers a wide range of tailoring services and enjoys the confidence of her customers in her good taste and experience.
Unfortunately, she does not have much working capital, so she asks Fundación Mario Santo Domingo for her first loan to buy cloth, thread, and accessories, so as to keep her business going without a hitch.
She knows the clothes she makes are in strong demand and banks on her future profits to buy new sewing machines to work faster.
She wants to get closer to her goal of renovating her house.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Wendy Paola

texts.es: Wendy es una joven emprendedora de 20 años que se encuentra residenciada en barrio de una localidad de Barranquilla y está comprometida con su cónyuge, ella se visiona  a futuro como una exitosa Ingeniera Industrial y propietaria de un almacén reconocido en el municipio, donde pueda ofrecer a libre demanda los productos que actualmente comercializa y mucha más variedad. Ella es una apasionada por las ventas y encontró en el comercio prendas de vestir, calzado y relojes, una alternativa para ser empresaria independiente y cumplir con sus demás propósitos sin alterar su ritmo normal, es decir, efectuar a cabalidad con sus deberes en el hogar y a nivel académico.  Cualquier día de la semana, Wendy a partir de las 8 a.m. hasta las 8 p.m. está disponible para exhibir personalmente sus productos o por intermedio de cualquier red social a sus amigos, compañeros de estudio y familiares, e incluso su base de clientes es cada vez mayor por los referidos de su clientela, y con la finalidad de surtir con nuevas colecciones de productos, realizó una solicitud de crédito, su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir en ropa y calzado, así tendrá una buena oferta para la temporada de fin de año y su inversión será de éxito. Wendy en compañía de su cónyuge planean a futuro comprar una vivienda y dar a sus futuros hijos una excelente calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Wendy, a young entrepreneur of 20 years of age, lives in Baranquilla and lives with her fiancé.
She sees herself in the future as a successful industrial engineer and owner of a well-known shop in the neighbourhood, where she wants to sell what she now does but in greater quantity and variety.
She loves selling clothes, shoes, and watches. 
Being an independent entrepreneur allows her to work on her own terms and dedicate her time to her studies and her household.
Wendy is available everyday from 8 am to 8 pm to sell her wares, directly or through a social network, to friends, classmates, and family.
Her customer base keeps growing thanks to referrals.
She wants to sell items from the newest ranges and thus asks Fundación Mario Santo Domingo for her first loan to buy clothes and shoes.
The goal is to have new merchandise on offer for the end-of-year season and increase her sales.
Wendy and her fiancé plan to buy a house and want to give a great life to their future children.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Milena Segrit

texts.es: Milena es una empresaria independiente que reside en un barrio del municipio de Barranquilla en compañía de su cónyuge e hijos, ella armoniza sus roles de una manera integral que le permite llevar a cabo cada una de sus responsabilidades y exigencias. Su negoció inició a razón de una necesidad peculiar en su comunidad religiosa, las mujeres visten atuendos recatados que hoy en día son muy escasos encontrar entre las colecciones y tendencias que presenta la moda, es por ello que decidió seguir el consejo que un amigo de la iglesia en donde se congrega, le sugirió: comercializar prendas de vestir pudorosas.  Tan pronto como pudo compró su primer surtido que con mucho agrado las integrantes de su comunidad compraron, de este modo su negocio ha sido todo un éxito.  Alternamente realiza adornos y recordatorios de eventos en foamy, actividad que le representa un ingreso adicional. En la actualidad necesita renovar el surtido de ropa y calzado, para ello realizó una solicitud de crédito, su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir en faldas, blusas, sandalias y vestidos. Su meta a futuro es tener un almacén y poder costear los gastos educativos de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Milena is an independent entrepreneur who lives in Barranquilla with her husband and her children.
She is very good at balancing life and work and is thus able to fulfil all her duties with the utmost care.
She started her business because she identified a need in the religious community she belongs to.
The women in her community favour modest clothing, which runs contrary to modern fashion and is thus very difficult to find in the shops nowadays.
Milena heeded the advice of a man she knew from her church and started selling conservative clothing.
No sooner had she purchased her first stock that the women in her congregation happily bought everything. A resounding success!
Milena also makes decorations and event invitations out of EVA foam, an activity which generates additional income.
She needs to replenish her stock and thus asks Fundación Mario Santo Domingo for her first loan to buy skirts, blouses, sandals, and dresses.
Her goal is to have a proper shop and to support her children through their studies.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Maria Milbia

texts.es:
Ella es María una divertida vendedora de alimentos de 41 años de edad, una persona inquieta, talentosa con buenas ideas y con mucho liderazgo y determinación para ejecutar sus proyectos.
Su actividad principal es la venta de verduras, pero ella cambio un poco la manera de vender, pues compro un vehículo no solo para vender por las calles, lleva los domicilios hasta la puerta de la casa y mientras llega  va ofreciendo sus productos en toda calle por donde transita, una idea que le ha dado excelentes frutos.
María debido a que las verduras son un producto que fácilmente se echa a perder nunca había surtido en cantidad pero debido a la buena acogida que ha tenido necesita tener más productos vender.
Por este motivo quiere solicitar un préstamo para abastecerse de frutas y verduras en cantidades esperando que su ingeniosa idea tenga más éxito.
texts.en:
María sells vegetabels and knows how to make people laugh.
She is 41, very active, and has talent and good ideas to spare.
She is also very charismatic and determined to see her projects throught to the end.
She is not your run-of-the-mill vegetable saleswoman: she had the idea to buy a vehicle and is thus able to stop and sell in one spot for a while or deliver door-to-door, stoppping to sell on the way if someone wants to buy vegetables. 
This has been very profitable.
María had never bought too many vegetables at the same time before to avoid the produce going bad. 
Now, however, faced with growing customer demand, she needs to buy a lot of vegetables in one go.
This is why she asks for a loan in order to buy more fruits and vegetables to keep her 'produce truck' a success.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell from her produce truck.

loans.name: Marco Aurelio

texts.es:
Marco es un hombre casado de 53 años de edad, padre de tres hijos adolescentes, se dedica al cultivo de aguacate, actividad que lleva desempeñando desde el año 1980, siendo un agricultor de tradición.
Heredo sus raíces campesinas, su padre le enseño todo lo que sabe de cultivar, espera en algún momento trasmitirle dichos conocimientos a sus hijos para que continúen con los cultivos de aguacate.
Su propósito con su negocio es llevar el alimento de cada día, mejorar las condiciones de vida y luchar por preservar sus terrenos.
Marco actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas que ayuden a preservar los frutos de sus palos de aguacate y alejar toda alimaña e insecto de ellos, por ello con el dinero comprara abonos y venenos.
Tu préstamo ayudara a a un agricultor de tradición a cuidar sus terrenos y seguir realizando la profesión con la que ayuda a su familia.
texts.en:
Marco is a married man, 53 years old, the father of three adolescent children. He works growing avocados, work that he has been doing since the year 1980, being a farmer by tradition. He inherited his rural roots, his father taught him everything he knows about crops, he hopes to at some point transmit this knowledge to his children so that they continue with the avocado crops.

His goal with his business is to bring food every day, improve his living conditions and fight to preserve his land.

Currently, Marco is asking for a loan to purchase agricultural supplies that help to preserve the fruits on his avocado plants and keep every pest and insect from them. For this, he will purchase manure and pesticides with the money.

Your loan will help a traditional farmer to care for his land and continue doing his profession with the help of his family.

loans.use: to purchase manure and pesticides.

loans.name: Maria Lucena

texts.es:
Ella es Lucena una persona arriesgada, osada, una persona que a pesar de sus dificultades económicas, nunca persistió de su sueño de  tener su propio taller de confección.
Lucena para lograrlo acudió le toco prestar dinero, trabajo para las deudas y logró pagarlas, ahora es una empresaria con recorrido, experiencia y buen volumen de trabajo, y se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para realizar un mantenimiento a sus máquinas y comprar insumos principales como hilos, remaches y artículos decorativos para su línea de ropa, también realizara mejoras locativas, dando un paso muy grande en la consolidación de su negocio.
Lucena tomo la iniciativa y se lanzó por el progreso, pensando en su futuro y en el de sus amadas princesas que tienen 14 años de edad la mayor y 7 meses la menor.
Su propósito es asegurar un buen futuro, una buena educación y una buena vivienda para ellas.
texts.en:
This is Lucena, a risk-taker, bold, a person who despite her economic difficulties never gave up her dream of having her own sewing shop.

To achieve this, Lucena took out loans, worked for the debts and managed to pay them off. Now she is a known businesswoman, with a good volume of work, and she is asking for a loan to do maintenance on her machines and to purchase basic supplies such as thread, rivets, and decorative items for her clothing line. She also will make improvements to the space, taking a very big step in strengthening her business.

Lucena took the initiative and leapt for progress, thinking of her future and that of her beloved princesses, the oldest of whom is 14 and the younger one is 7 months old.

Her goal is to assure a good future, a good education and a good house for them.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her machines.

loans.name: Mariluz

texts.es:
Mariluz es una mujer de 35 años de edad, una persona luchadora, siempre se había dedicado a las labores domésticas y buscar empleos temporales ya que no conseguía algo fijo, una persona que sabe muy bien el concepto de rebuscar y luchar por la vida, pues desde siempre se ha valido de sí misma para comprar sus cosas y satisfacer sus necesidades.
Ahora ella no está sola, tiene una pareja y una pequeña de 2 años de edad, quiere darlo todo, por este motivo quiere solicitar un préstamo, uno para iniciar un negocio de venta de mercancía como perfumes y accesorios de plata.
texts.en: 35-year-old Mariluz is a determined person. She has always done housework and looked for temporary jobs as she did not have anything permanent. She is a person who is well aware the concept of looking for a new life and struggling to get by, as she has always coped by herself to buy things and supply her needs. She is now no longer alone, she has a husband and a 2-year-old child. She wants to do the best she can for her child and so she is applying for a loan to enable her to set up a business selling items such as perfume and silver accessories.

loans.use: to setup a business selling perfume and silver accessories

loans.name: Andres

texts.es:
Andrés es un joven de 24 años de edad, una persona responsable, emprendedor, con hambre de triunfo y progreso, tiene una carnicería, en la foto lo podemos ver rodeado de cerdos y ese precisamente es el motivo que lo tiene hoy ante la comunidad Kiva, solicitando un apoyo económico con el que comprara cerdos para abastecer su local.
Andrés es habitante de la ceja y justamente el negocio donde compra es de este sector, tu apoyo no solo beneficiara a este joven empresario, sino a las persona dueña del criadero de cerdos que como Andrés con emprendimiento buscan cambiar la realidad de sus familias, progresar y aspirar a una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Andrés is a young 24-year old. He is a responsible, entrepreneurial person with a drive for success and progress. He has a butchery. In the photo, he is seen surrounded by pigs and that is precisely the reason he has for the Kiva community. He is asking for economic support with which he will buy pigs to supply his place.

Andrés is a resident of La Ceja and the business where he buys is just in this area. Your support will not just benefit this young businessman, it will also benefit the owner of the pig farm who, like Andrés, with entrepreneurship look to change the reality of their families, progress and aspire to have a better life.

loans.use: to buy pigs, process them and then sell them at the butcher.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos Alberto es una persona responsable, honesto una persona trabajadora, emprendedora, una persona que sabe aprovechar muy bien los recursos que tiene a su favor, por ejemplo, tiene un carro que n o ponía a producir, decidió comprar mercancía y salir a las calles a vender a toda persona que se acercara a este.
Está actividad la realiza pro necesidad económica, la venta de mercancía la ha abierto las puertas a un mejor futuro, por ello quiere entregar todo de sí, su mejor y mayor esfuerzo por hacer de esta actividad un éxito.
Solicita un préstamo que quiere invertir en la compra de surtido como jeans, camisetas y sandalias.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto is responsible, trustworthy, hard-working, and full of enterprising spirit.
He sees opportunity everywhere: for instance, he had a vehicle that he was not using and came up with the idea to buy merchandise, take to the streets, and sell to any customer within range.
He needs to work for a living and says that selling merchandise gave him a better chance at life. 
This is why he is determined to spare no effort to make his business a success.
He asks for a loan to buy jeans, T-shirts, and sandals to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Edith Imelda

texts.es: Edith es una mujer de 52 años de edad que se dedica a prestar sus servicios en un comedor de la zona, lo que le permite obtener los ingresos necesarios para sostener la economía de su hogar. Edith vive en casa de su propiedad junto a su esposo y sus hijos desde hace 27 años. Edith desea comprar puertas para su vivienda, ya que la puerta que da a la calle está deteriorada, y los cuartos de su vivienda no encuentran con puerta, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en puertas y mano de obra para instalar puertas en su vivienda y brindar mayor protección a su familia.
texts.en:
Edith is a 52 year old woman, who is earning a living by offering her services to a restaurant in her area. This allows her to make the needed income to sustain her household.

Edith has been living in her own house together with her husband and her children for 27 years. Edith wants to buy doors for her home because the front door is worn down, and the rooms of her home do not have doors.

This is why she is requesting a loan with FUSAI to invest into doors and labor to install doors in her home and offer her family more security.

loans.use: to invest into doors and labor to install doors in her home and offer her family more security.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es: Don Andres de 67 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo de 19 años de edad, Don Andres posee una tienda en su casa de habitación en la cual vende variedad de productos de primera necesidad desde hace 30 años, su deseo es ampliar su tienda con el fin de mejorar las ventas y sus ingresos ya que desea dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de productos de tienda como: huevos, cereales, golosinas, aceite, macarrones, detergente, etc. y asi poder tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: 67-year-old Andres lives in his own home with his wife and 19-year-old son. Andres runs a shop from a room in his home, where he has been selling a range of basic products for 30 years. His ambition is to extend his shop so that he can increase his sales and his income, as he wants to provide better living conditions for his family, Therefore, he is applying to INTEGRAL for this loan to buy products for his shop: eggs, cereals, sweets, oil, macaroni, detergent, etc. This will enable him to boost his income.

loans.use: to buy eggs, cereals, sweets, oil, macaroni, detergent, etc.

loans.name: Mariela Rosa

texts.es:
Mariela es una mujer de 57 años de edad, una persona solitaria que perdió hace un tiempo a su esposo, no tiene hijos, solo cuenta con una tienda para generar los ingresos necesarios para el pago de las deudas, actualmente se encuentra un préstamo para aumentar sus ventas y tener  suficiente surtido para seguir operando.
Para ella su tienda es algo muy valioso, algo que la mantiene entretenida y en constante interacción con personas, por ello quiere luchar para preservar su amada tienda.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de productos de la canasta familiar, snack y refrescos.
texts.en:
Mariela, 57, lives alone. She lost her husband some time ago and has no children.
Her sole source of income is her shop, which generates enough to keep her in business and help repay her loans.
The shop is very dear to her because it keeps her active and in constant contact with people, which is why she will fight to preserve it.
She asks for a loan to buy everyday items, snacks, and drinks to sell.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Rut Eliana

texts.es:
Rut es una mujer de 27 años de edad que en busca de la independencia económica monto un negocio de cría de cerdos, es madre de un pequeño de 5 años de edad, ha crecido en un ambiente donde los recursos escasean.
Trabaja diariamente por su objetivo, busca ser autosuficiente, no depender de su pareja porque no sabe cuándo le pueda faltar o dejar y quiere estar preparada por si llega a pasar este hecho, de lo contrario junto con su esposo pueden sacar su familia adelante y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
Solicita un préstamo para crecer como empresa, el préstamo será usado en la compra de cerdos, vitaminas, alimento de engorde.
texts.en:
Rut, 27, wanted a business of her own and started raising pigs.
She has a five-year-old son and comes from a poor family.
She works everyday at achieving her goal, which is to be financially independent from her husband.
She says that you never know when your significant other might die or leave you, so she wants to be prepared in case something bad happens.
Of course, if all goes well, then her business will help the family lead a better life!
She asks for a loan to improve her business by buying pigs, vitamins, and fattening feed.

loans.use: to buy pigs, vitamins, and fattening feed.

loans.name: German

texts.es:
Germán es un agricultor muy trabajador, una persona que ama su profesión, que valoro lo que la tierra le ha dado, no solo alimentos, le brindó la oportunidad de tener un empleo y ayudar a su familia económicamente, por ello respeta mucho su labor y la ejerce con gran pasión.
Actualmente Germán se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para recabar tuéneles de aproximadamente 200 metros, cercar sus terrenos, con alambre de púa y reparar la empacadora.
texts.en:
Germán is a very hard-working farmer, a person who loves his profession, who values what the land has given him, not only food, it has offered him the opportunity to have a job and help his family economically, for this he respects his work a lot and does it with great passion.

Currently Germán is asking for a loan to get approximately 200 meters of polytunnels, fence his land with barbed wire and repair the baler.

loans.use: to get approximately 200 meters of polytunnel.

loans.name: Dayasney

texts.es:
Dayasney es una joven de 24 años de edad, una mujer residente de la zona de montería, madre de dos hijos de 2 y 5 años de edad, por necesidad de ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar salió a buscar empleo, pero le cerraron las puertas, ella no se rindió y decidió ser independiente montó un negocio de venta de alimentos en su hogar, espera tener éxito y poder ser de utilidad para su familia. 
Actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de algunos artículos que no cuenta en su vivienda, el dinero será destinado en la compra de utensilios, ollas, cucharones, el resto del dinero será para la compra de materia prima para elaborar productos fritos.
texts.en:
Dayasney, 24, lives in Montería and has two children (aged 2 and 5).
In order to help with household expenses, she tried to find work but everywhere she turned the doors would close.
She did not give up, instead turning to entrepreneurship to sell food at her house.
Her hope is to be successful and help her family.
She asks for a loan to buy cooking implements, such as pans and ladles, as well as ingredients to make fried food.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients and supplies.

loans.name: Anderson

texts.es:
Admirable es la palabra que mejor describe al joven Anderson, un hombre de 18 años de edad que trabaja todos los días en el campo pero no se conforma con las actividades agrícolas, desempeña esta actividad para poder pagar sus estudios universitarios que actualmente está cursando, una persona digna de admirar, esas ganas de progresar y sacar a su familia adelante, ser un profesional y tener conocimientos avanzados ya sea para trabajar en una importante empresa o mejorar la producción de sus terrenos.
Actualmente él joven se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas para iniciar un cultivo de papa, los insumos que comprara serán semillas, abonos y riegos.
texts.en:
Anderson is truly an admirable young man. At the age of 18, he works everyday on the fields to pay for university, which he is currently attending.
He deserves our respect for showing such will to improve his lot in life and help his family.
He want to become a professional and acquire advanced knowledge that will help him work for a big company or improve his land's productivity.
He asks for a loan to buy what he needs to grow potatoes: seeds, manure, and pesticide.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies to grow potatoes.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana continúa con su negocio de tienda de barrio. El crédito que obtuvo lo invirtió comprando alimentos y artículos de primera necesidad, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque su negocio estuvo abierto todo el tiempo. Actualmente su negocio funciona correctamente, los clientes acuden con frecuencia porque el negocio esta abastecido y surtido, “tengo la suerte que todos mis clientes me aprecian y vienen a la tienda aunque sea a charlar…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes frecuentes, la desventaja es la dificultad de abastecerlo. Su sueño es contar con su propio capital para su negocio, ella desea comprar mercadería por mayor para abastecer su tienda. Esta es la 3 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 4 años que viene realizando esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Juana solicita un préstamo para comprar mercadería por mayor para abastecer su tienda.
texts.en:
Juana still runs her business of a neighborhood store. She has invested the loan she had received into buying food and basic necessities. Her payments were on time because her business stayed open all the time.

At the moment, her business works well. The customers visit frequently because the store is well stocked and assorted. "I am fortunate that all my clients appreciate me and come to the store, even if it is just to have a chat," she says.

The advantage of her business is that she has regular customers. The disadvantage is the difficulty of assorting it. Her goal is to have her own capital for her business. She wants to buy goods at wholesale to stock up her store. This is her third loan cycle with this institution in the four years of running her business.

For these reason Juana is requesting a loan to buy goods at wholesale and stock up her store.

loans.use: to buy goods at wholesale to stock up her store.

loans.name: Radam

texts.en:
Radam is 38 years old and married with five children, four of whom are in school. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a buy and sell charcoal business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell. Radam has been in this business for 5 years.

She aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Baby Aloura

texts.en:
Baby Aloura is 27 years old and married with three children. With two children in school, Baby Aloura works very hard to provide for them. Baby Aloura runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, beveragres, home product care, and other groceries. Baby Aloura has been in this business for 8 years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Baby Aloura would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, beveragres, home product care, and other groceries.

loans.name: Soeun

texts.en:
Soeun, 52, lives in Phnum Sruoch district, Kampong Speu province. She owns farmland on which she grows rice to sell to the local dealers. Until now, it has been almost 15 years that she has been a farmer. By working very hard, she is able to make approximately USD 2.50 per day.

Soeun would like to improve her living standard by having clean energy for household use. Because of the lack of capital, she is asking for a loan to build a biogas digester under the project of NBP (National Biogas Program) in partnering with HKL. After an initial investment in this system, she hopes that she won’t spend much money on fuel and will have less smoke from wood or charcoal.

Thanks to the green loan program with a special rate offered by HKL, her family can gain access to clean energy while protecting the environment.

loans.use: to build a biogas digester.

loans.name: Hazel

texts.en:
Hazel is 34 years old and has two children, two of them is still in school. She is married. Hazel is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through GDMPC to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Hazel has been in this business for 15 years now and has borrowed three times in the past from GDMPC to sustain her business.

In the future, Hazel would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Alberta

texts.en:
A widow for several years now, Alberta remains strong considering all the trials that she has gone through. She’s a survivor because she was able to raise her children well. And now she is looking after her grandson while her daughter is working abroad. Since she’s been used to multi-tasking, she can still manage her variety store and dried fish vending.

The income derived from her two businesses goes up and down. The weather and competition within the area greatly affect its stability. When it’s raining and fish are expensive, she focuses on manning her store. But the stability of her store is also shaken by long-time debts by some of her neighbors. She has to make it more secured with additional capital amounting to PHP 25,000 that she can use to buy more grocery items to sell. With an enhanced inventory, she can still earn enough despite many debtors. The additional capital will also increase her buying power when fish are scarce and expensive. She’s praying that you have the kind heart to extend support to her. It will surely go a long way.

Alberta constantly prays for good health and better living conditions someday. She meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy a high volume of dried fish to resell, as well as add more grocery items to her variety store.

loans.name: Farhat

texts.en:
Farhat is a simple housewife. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband has been providing transport facilities by driving a taxi for 10 years. Her husband is responsible to fulfill the needs of the entire family.

Her husband needs to have maintenance on his taxi because the current condition of his taxi is not good; it requires more maintenance charges on a daily basis. Due to insufficient financial means, her husband is unable to have maintenance on his taxi. Therefore, Farhat has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan, Farhat's husband can afford the maintenance cost easily and provide better transport facilities to earn profitable income. Farhat also plans to make savings with the profit amount of her husband's income to meet her family's needs in future.

Farhat is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to repair her husband's taxi.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 37 years old and married with three children.

Evelyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, including bread, beverages, canned goods, home care products, and other groceries.

Evelyn has borrowed and paid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Evelyn aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, including bread, beverages, canned goods, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Joeciel

texts.en:
Joeciel is 40 years old and has three children. She is married and all three children are in school. Joeciel is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Joeciel requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Joeciel has been raising pigs for eight years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. In the future, Joeciel would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is 59 years old and has six children. She is married and three of her children are still in school. Elisa is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. Elisa requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilzers and other farm supplies.

Elisa has been in this business for 47 years now and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. In the future, Elisa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilzers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Mangga Tdm Group

texts.en:
Fenidora is a 34-year-old woman who is the leader of the Mangga TDM group that consists of five women. She is married to Selestinus, 38, a bricklayer. They are blessed with three adorable children between 3 and 15 years old, two of whom go to school.

In addition to looking after her family, Fenidora owns a business of producing and selling cakes. She has been engaged in the business for the last six months. She is grateful for the income generated from the business, which enables her to support her husband in meeting their living expenses.

She was thinking of improving her business by producing more cakes than usual. However, she also needs more capital to make it happen. She plans to buy the baking ingredients such as wheat, butter, sugar, eggs, etc. and kerosene.

Fenidora and other women were enthusiastic when they got an explanation of the TLM group loan product from an account officer. They then formed the Mangga TDM group and requested a loan of totaling IDR 10,000,000. They also got information that Kiva, via TLM, has assisted other groups in improving their businesses.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of baking ingredients and supplies such as wheat, butter, sugar, and eggs as well as kerosene.
